You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women 2018-08-08 **Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women** ## Soy protein might have positive impacts on bone strength for women who have not yet reached menopause, the researchers said. Women who consume soy protein found in foods such as tofu and soy milk might be able to counter the negative effects of menopause on bone and metabolic health, a study suggests. For postmenopausal women osteoporosis, decreased physical activity and weight gain are serious health concerns. Soy protein might have positive impacts on bone strength for women who have not yet reached menopause, the researchers said. "The findings suggest that all women might see improved bone strength by adding some soy-based whole foods -- tofu and soy milk, to their diet," said Pamela Hinton, Professor at the University of Missouri in the US. "We also believe that soy-based diets can improve metabolic function for postmenopausal women," she added. In the study, the team examined the effects of soy versus corn-based diets on rats selectively bred to have low fitness levels. They were further divided into those with and without ovaries to mimic effects of menopause. Comparing the impact of soy diet on bone strength and metabolic function on the rats it was found that the tibia bones of those fed soy were stronger compared to the ones fed corn-based diet, regardless of ovarian hormone status. Moreover, soy-based diet also improved metabolic function of the rats both with and without ovaries. "Our findings suggest that women do not even need to eat as much soy as is found in typical Asian diets, but adding some tofu or other soy, for example foods found in vegetarian diets, could help strengthen bones," Hinton said. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 2018-06-01 # 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 食物中的蛋白質由氨基酸組成，蛋白質的質量取決於它所含氨基酸的數量和類型。動物性食物含有優質蛋白質，蛋清含有最高質量的蛋白質。與其他植物或植物蛋白不同，大豆蛋白含有健康所需的所有必需氨基酸。這使得大豆蛋白成為一種完整的蛋白質，類似於動物性食物中的蛋白質。 **類型** 根據MedlinePlus.com的說法，你的身體需要20種氨基酸來構建正常生長和保持健康所需的蛋白質，9種被稱為必需氨基酸，因為它們不能由你的身體製造，必須來自你的飲食。在大豆蛋白和許多動物食物中發現的9種必需氨基酸是組氨酸，異亮氨酸，亮氨酸，賴氨酸，蛋氨酸，苯丙氨酸，蘇氨酸，色氨酸和纈氨酸。精氨酸對兒童至關重要，但不是成年人。還有10種非必需氨基酸，存在於各種食物中，並與一些或所有必需氨基酸不同組合。如果您的飲食不提供，您的身體可以製造這些非必需氨基酸。 **功能** 大豆蛋白在你的消化系統中分解成氨基酸，被吸收到你的血液中並在你的身體中傳播。在這個過程中，這些氨基酸中的一些與其他氨基酸結合形成各種類型的蛋白質，為您的器官和組織提供結構，並在各種身體過程中發揮作用。大豆蛋白中的一些氨基酸也可以作為體內的激素，酶和其他活性物質。作為最後的手段，當碳水化合物和脂肪不可用時，您的身體也可以使用蛋白質來產生能量。 ## **來源** 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸在豆腐，大豆粉，豆奶，紋理大豆蛋白，大豆肉替代品，味噌中發現不同的量和組合，味噌是發酵的大豆醬，大豆和毛豆，它們是綠色大豆。 **限制** 大豆蛋白，蛋氨酸和賴氨酸中的兩種必需氨基酸僅以少量存在。根據美國農業部發表在“農業和食品化學雜誌”上的研究，這種限制，加上大豆過敏和難以消化大豆蛋白的人數，意味著大豆蛋白質與動物蛋白質不相上下。 作者： MOLLY MCADAMS2017年10月3日 https://www.livestrong.com/article/352117-amino-acids-in-soy-protein/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆腐和食物中毒 2023-04-17 **豆腐和食物中毒** 豆腐是一種由凝固豆漿製成的營養豐富的蛋白質來源。它在東亞美食中很受歡迎，是一種常見的植物性蛋白質。雖然豆腐是一種易腐爛的食物，可能含有病原體或致病微生物，但它並不是食源性疾病的常見原因。然而，為了安全地享用豆腐，需要採取一些預防措施來降低食物中毒的風險。 **食物是如何被感染的** 根據疾病預防控制中心的說法，當動物或人類糞便中的病原體污染食物時，或者當食物暴露在理想的溫度範圍內足夠長的時間以使任何致病微生物大量繁殖時，食物可能成為疾病的來源。如果食物烹飪得當並在正確的溫度下儲存，其中一些潛在的病原體是無害的。交叉污染是另一種傳播方式，用於生肉或雞肉的刀具或砧板反過來會污染其他食物。感染了金黃色葡萄球菌或葡萄球菌的食品加工人員可能通過將食物暴露於受感染的切口或通過對食物咳嗽來傳播這種細菌。雖然許多病原體可以被高溫破壞，但微生物可以在暴露於不安全溫度的食物中形成毒素，而這些可能不會被烹飪破壞。 **關於食物中毒** 美國疾病控制與預防中心 (CDC) 估計，美國每年約有六分之一的人因食源性疾病而生病。導致食源性疾病的最常見病原體是致病細菌和病毒，但寄生蟲、真菌、天然食物毒素甚至重金屬也可能是罪魁禍首。由於豆漿在製作豆腐之前已被徹底加熱，因此可以殺死大豆中的大多數細菌和病毒，正確加工和處理的豆腐不太可能受到污染。 **豆腐是如何被感染的** 雖然不常見，但豆腐可能會通過幾種方式引起食源性疾病。其中之一是豆腐本身的污染——例如，食品加工設施的不潔設備。豆腐也可能被食物準備者污染——未洗手、對食物打噴嚏或咳嗽，或接觸其他食物中的病原體——如生雞肉。如果儲存在受污染的水中，豆腐也可能接觸病原體。如果購買散裝出售的豆腐 - 儲存在一大桶水中 - 會有更多的安全問題，因為例如未洗手或不干淨的水會感染整批豆腐。 **保持豆腐安全** 為盡量減少食物中毒的風險，請按照包裝說明存放豆腐。有些豆腐可以在室溫下保存直到打開，然後需要冷藏。許多形式的豆腐都是單獨裝水和冷藏的。如果您批量購買豆腐，請僅選擇信譽良好的來源，並詢問有關製作新批次的頻率和換水頻率的問題。製作豆腐時，請使用乾淨的器具和容器，以免交叉污染。還應及時將任何剩菜存放在冰箱中，因為細菌在暴露於 40 至 140 華氏度的危險區域時生長最好。 https://www.livestrong.com / https://www.livestrong.com/article/164132-tofu-food-poisoning/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

Stinky Tofu Worth a Try * No Debate: Soy is Beneficial to Health * Benefits of Fermented Soy * Drinking Soy Milk for Weight Loss: Does It Work? * Can You Eat Soy Every Day? * Lower Risk of Breast Cancer * Difference Between Edamame and Soybeans * Soy might improve fertility and help with hot flashes. * Can You Eat Raw Tofu? * Soy uses * Soy Does Not Affect Puberty * Soy beans, black beans and other legumes rank first, which are excellent sources of protein! * Soy products have high nutritional value. You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Health Benefits of Soy Milk 2017-12-01 **Health Benefits of Soy Milk** Soy milk, which is made from soaking, grinding and boiling soy beans with water, is a very nutritious drink. Soy is naturally high in essential fatty acids, proteins, fiber, vitamins and minerals. These nutrients provide energy and keep your body functioning at its optimum level. Below are the six most important health benefits you can acquire from drinking soy milk. 1. Improve Lipid Profile The most important attribute of soy milk is its ability to improve your blood lipid profile. Unlike dairy milk, whichis high in saturated fat and cholesterol, soy milk fat is mostly unsaturated with zero cholesterol. The monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fatty acids in soy can inhibit the transport of cholesterol into your blood stream. Studies have shown that regular intake of soy can significantly lower you blood concentrations of triglyceride and low density lipoproteins (LDL) and raise the level of high density lipoproteins (HDL). This combined effect makes soy milk an ideal drink if you have high cholesterol or have a family history of coronary heart diseases. 2. Strengthen Blood Vessel Integrity The omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids as well as the powerful phyto-antioxidants in soy can effectively protect your blood vessels from lesions and hemorrhage. These compounds bind to the blood vessel lining and defend your lining cells from free radical attacks and cholesterol deposits. The binding of these nutrients also improve the fluidity and flexibility of your blood vessels so that they are much more resilient to blood pressure changes. 3. Promote Weight Loss Soy milk is naturally lower in sugar content than regular milk. Cow's milk has about 12 grams of sugar per cup as opposed to only 7 grams in soy milk. This is why a cup of whole soy milk has only 80 calories, which is the equivalent of skim milk. In addition, the monounsaturated fatty acid in soy milk can inhibit your intestinal absorption of fat, which is another great advantage for weight loss. Drinking soy milk also gives you an extra dose of fiber, keeping your feeling fuller for longer time. 4. Prevent Prostate Cancer Soy milk is a rich source of phytoestrogen, a unique plant hormone that can inhibit the production of testosterone in men. Reduced testosterone levels can significantly cut the risk of prostate cancer. Studies have shown that men who eat a soy-rich diet are less likely to develop prostate hypertrophy or prostate cancer. 5. Prevent Postmenopausal Syndromes During menopause, a woman's natural production of estrogen drops to a minimum. The sudden reduction of estrogen creates a number of health problems for postmenopausal women. Postmenopausal women have higher risks of heart disease, diabetes and obesity. They are also more vulnerable to depression, mood swings, insomnia and other psychological disorders. The phytoestrogen in soy is an effective estrogen replacement. Regular intake of soy is a great way to prevent and alleviate these postmenopausal syndromes. 6. Prevent Osteoporosis Osteoporosis is another age and hormone related disease. The phytoestrogen in soy can help accelerate calcium absorption by your body and prevent the loss of bone mass. The Specialist of Soyfood Machinery-Ta Ti Hsing Machinery Co., Ltd * English * Traditional Chinese * HI!guest * Login In * Register Search * Company Profile * Products * New Products * News * Knowledge * Contact Us Company Profile * Refernece Map for Our Customers * Company History * Patent - Certification * Pro-Elite Team * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Company Profile * Home/ * Company Profile/ * Company History ● **In 1961**, the founder, Mr. Cho, graduated from the first private vocational school in Taiwan- Taipei Kai-Nan High School, founded Ta Ti Machinery Co., Ltd with his mechanical proficiency；committed to the manufacture, research and development of soy food machinery. ○ As early as the 1960s, the founder, Mr. Cho, recognized the importance of international market expansion. ● **In 1969**, he resolutely went overseas to strive for worldwide business territory. After more than 60 years all-out effort, well-known food manufacturers in Taiwan, such as Uni-President, I-MEI, Northwest Foods, Brothers Farm Foods and Tripodking, etc., all use Ta Ti Hsing’s soy food machines. There are so many overseas customers, which are widely distributed in 32 countries including North and South America, the European Union, New Zealand, Australia, Asia and Africa. ● **Plant expansion in 1971**. Ta Ti Hsing Machinery Co., Ltd has been passed down for three generations for more than 60 years. Ta Ti Hsing is the oldest brand of soybean food machine company in Taiwan. ○ In the early days of establishment, the main product was the grinder. The founder, Mr. Cho, developed the first electric grinder in Taiwan with unrelenting efforts. It was the pioneer of Taiwan’s semi-automatic tofu machine at that time. Later, we continued to invest in the research and development of soybean food machines based on the grinder. ● **In 1980**, the fully automatic soybean food production line was officially launched with the joint efforts of the second-generation successor, General Manager, Mr. Cho, Chien-Wang. ● **In 1982**, Ta Ti Hsing won the Golden Dragon Award for High Quality Domestic Machines in the Republic of China. ● **In 1985**, recognized by the Taoyuan government and won the Top Ten Outstanding Machines in Taoyuan County. ○ After 2000, general manager, Mr. Cho, Chien-Wang, continued the business policy of “Based on Taiwan! Upholding a global vision” Constantly expand the international market and deepen the service in the domestic market. ●**In 2009**, the third-generation successor, Andrew, officially joined the management team. It has greatly strengthened the monitoring equipment of Ta Ti Hsing machinery products with his computer science expertise, and established a video sales service system. ●**In 2012**, Ta Ti Hsing’s machine products have successively completed various professional certifications, and won the patent certificate of the Republic of China. ● **In 2013**, more than 50 manufacturers participated in the Global Soy Products Manufacturers Summit gathered in Taoyuan. We discuss how to provide the highest quality soy products for mankind, and strengthen human health. The manufacturers also affirms that Ta Ti Hsing was the behind-the-scenes “grinder” of the world’s high-quality soy products during the meeting due to the various soy products machines increasing the output value and value of soy products developed and designed by Ta Ti Hsing. ● **In 2014**, The first manufacturers in Taiwan, which passed the Swiss SGS verification for the whole tofu automatic production line and obtained European CE certification. ● **In 2015**, the new modern plant in Daxi was planned. Continue to expand the international market and deepen the service in the domestic market. We will keep fighting to provide more efficient, environmentally friendly and safter soybean food equipment in the future. ● **In 2017**, Ta Ti Hsing offered an integrated system service from turnkey project, research & development, design, production, setup to the final test run. Keep promoting traditional Chinese soy products to the world. ● **In 2018**, Ta Ti Hsing Daxi Plant was completed. The guests at home and abroad gathered for the opening ceremony. The 2nd Global Soy Products Manufacturers Summit was also held on the same day. The thanks party was held in the new plant. The three-generation management team thanked to everyone on behalf of the company. In recent years, the world's demand for nutritious and natural soybean food is increasing day by day. Ta Ti Hsing is actively expanding its international business and deepening its domestic market. S ● **In 2019**, Ta Ti Hsing participated the SBIR program of the Technology Office of the Ministry of Economic Affairs. Hope to help SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprise) achieve energy savings and lower costs. Hence, “SHOKUNIN I” fully automatic soymilk machine is developed. And won the excellent manufacturer of Taoyuan City’s local industry innovation research and development plan. ● **In 2020**, Ta Ti Hsing was listed as an excellent soy product equipment factory in cooperation with the “Domestic Soybean Industry Visit” of the Agriculture and Food Administration. **●** **In 2021**, environmental awareness around the world has increased in recent years. Plant-based protein demand is expected to grow exponentially. In order to keep close tabs on the health of the public, Ta Ti Hsing participated in the CITD assisting traditional industry technology development plan of the Industrial Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs. We were hoping to create high-quality additive-free defoamer soybean milk equipment. That’s “Hermetic Ball-type Cooking Machine ”of our innovative development which improves both nutritional value and output. It also meets the market demand for energy saving, carbon reduction and cost reduction in recent years. And won the excellent manufacturer of Taiwan's industrial innovation research and development plan, and make a concerted effort for the earth! **● In 2023**, **Awarded the 20th National Brand Yushan Award for "Outstanding Enterprise" in 2023.**This honor attests to the company's outstanding performance in brand development, innovative research, and international market competitiveness. It also signifies a high-quality image in "Quality, Taste, and Brand." With this recognition, TaTiHsing assumes the responsibility of enhancing the visibility of "Made in Taiwan, " contributing to international acclaim for Taiwanese manufacturing and propelling Taiwan onto the global stage! * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790123 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * The Secret Weapon of Soybeans: A Complete Protein with Nine Essential Amino Acids? 2025-01-22 **【The Secret Weapon of Soybeans: A Complete Protein with Nine Essential Amino Acids?】** Before we compare the differences between the two types of protein, it’s important to know what amino acids are. Amino acids are the molecules that combine to form proteins, and they can be used as a source of energy for the body. Our bodies are able to produce some amino acids, but the nine essential amino acids that our bodies need can only be obtained through foods. Foods that contain all nine essential amino acids are considered complete proteins. Incomplete proteins are foods that contain some of the essential amino acids, but not all nine. Examples of foods that are complete sources of protein include:Animal Meats、Dairy、Soy Foods.Examples of foods that are incomplete sources of protein include: Nuts、Legumes、Seeds、Vegetables、Whole Grains. Soy stands out as one of the few plant-based foods to be considered a complete protein. This includes soy food such as tofu, edamame, tempeh, soy milk and more. So, if you’re looking to add more plant-based proteins into your diet, soy is a great option. Want to produce coveted soybean-based foods? TaTiHsing has been specializing in soybean food production equipment for over 60 years. With a dedication to craftsmanship, we design fully automated, high-quality equipment that meets the needs of modern production. In this era of trending plant-based proteins, let us simplify your production process and help you create healthy, premium soy products. Together, we can seize the market wave and open a new era of health! You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Weight Loss Soy Diet: A Powerful Way to Lose Weight 2023-10-20 **Weight Loss Soy Diet: A Powerful Way to Lose Weight** Many of the popular diets today restrict essential nutrients. They might be low in carbohydrates, fat, protein, or low in some combination of these three macronutrients. A diet plan like this can be unbalanced and might not provide you with optimal nutrition. This can result in poor long-term health. The poor long-term health obtained with many of these diet plans are also due to the fact that many of them do not teach good eating and exercise habits, resulting in an unhealthy overall lifestyle. While our weight loss soy diet lowers calories, which is an essential part of every diet plan, it does not restrict any nutrients. This allows you to get all the nutrition you need for healthy and optimal dieting, making our weight loss soy diet a powerful way to lose weight. This weight loss soy diet also recognizes the importance of exercise to any diet plan. Since exercise is initially difficult for many of us, briskly walking for 30–45 minutes per day for 6 days each week is a great way to start. This combination makes our weight loss soy diet so powerful that dieters using soy protein in our clinical trial lost an average of 26 pounds in 16 weeks, including excellent belly fat loss of about 25%. Additionally, our soy diet provides the extra benefits of soy protein — benefits you won’t get from a diet plan that doesn’t include soy. For example, soy is a high quality protein that contains all the essential amino acids for human nutrition. Also, the soy foods in our weight loss diet have a low glycemic index. This means that they won’t cause rapid blood sugar spikes, like high glycemic foods. This might lead to fewer hunger cravings and better appetite control — a powerful benefit. Soy protein is also heart healthy, as shown by the FDA health claim that consuming 25 grams of soy protein daily, as part of a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may reduce the risk of heart disease. In addition to its heart health benefits, soy protein has been reported to have numerous health benefits, including younger-looking skin, hair, and nails support, menopause hot flash reduction, and lean muscle mass support. It is clear that diet plans lacking soy protein foods can’t offer all of the same benefits. In summary, it is apparent that a well-balanced, diet plan that includes adequate amounts of exercise is a simple, delicious, and powerful way to lose weight. Our soy protein gives you the energy from protein. This can help you feel like exercising! * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【跨足國際!大地興攜手美國黃豆協會探索全球市場】 2024-05-22 **【跨足國際!大地興攜手美國黃豆協會探索全球市場】** 身為台灣黃豆食品機械製造解決方案供應商，大地興一直致力於在黃豆生產設備領域持續精進與創新，同時積極跨足國際舞台，獲取各項豆類應用與知識。2024年5月14日，大地興應美國黃豆協會(USSEC)盛情邀約，前往越南胡志明市參加了「黃豆原料的推廣與應用，及永續且營養的食品」研討會。 在這場研討會上，大地興作為演講者登台，與來自世界各地的嘉賓分享了我們的專利型蝶刀磨豆機，旨在為現場的黃豆製品廠商提供更優質、更有效率的生產設備。此外，研討會也深入探討了基因改造食品議題，並提供了有關黃豆蛋白過敏源的相關資訊。這些努力不僅突顯了大地興在機器方面的領先地位，同時也展現了我們持續提升軟實力的決心，致力於為所有客戶提供更全面的黃豆食品生產解決方案。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Lower Risk of Breast Cancer 2022-09-28 **Lower Risk of Breast Cancer** ## Research shows that women who consume soy are less likely to get breast cancer. One study found that women averaging one cup of soy milk or about one half cup of tofu daily have a 30% lower risk of developing breast cancer compared with women who eat little or no soy. This may be due in part to protective substances called isoflavones found in soy foods. ## In a 2013 meta-analysis that analyzed data from 22 studies, researchers found that, among Asian women, those who consumed the most isoflavones (compared with those who consumed the least) had a 32% lower risk of breast cancer. A protective effect was observed for both pre- and postmenopausal cancers. A 2014 meta-analysis reached similar conclusions. Western women don’t typically eat much soy, so it’s harder to compare between high and low levels of intake. However, eating soy foods during the preteen and teen years, when breast tissue is forming, may be especially protective. ## Lower Risk of Recurrence ## What about women who have been diagnosed with breast cancer? Researchers found that women diagnosed with estrogen-negative breast cancer who ate the most soy isoflavones had a 21% lower risk of dying from cancer compared with those who ate the least. ## The Women’s Healthy Eating and Living Study also showed that soy may help protect breast cancer survivors. Researchers found that women who ate the most soy cut their risk of cancer coming back or cancer death in half. Another study followed 5,042 women previously diagnosed with breast cancer for four years. Women who regularly consumed soy products like soy milk, tofu, or edamame came out ahead. They were about a third less likely to have their cancer come back, and 29% less likely to die from cancer compared with women who ate little soy. Numerous other studies confirm these findings. Women who avoid soy get no advantage, while women who consume soy are less likely to have their cancer return. How might soy help? Soy isoflavones may help keep estrogen signaling at healthy levels. Estrogens are female hormones made by women and, to a lesser extent, men. Estrogen works by binding to “docking sites,” or receptors, on cells. When estrogen binds to its receptor, it can trigger certain cancer cells to grow. However, your cells have two different kinds of estrogen receptors: alpha and beta. Estrone, the main estrogen in women after menopause, binds mainly to the alpha receptor. Soy isoflavones preferentially bind to beta receptors. This binding seems to help block the cell growth that’s part of the cancer process. https://www-pcrm-org.translate.goog/good-nutrition/nutrition-information/soy-and-health?\_x\_tr\_sl=en&\_x\_tr\_tl=zh-TW&\_x\_tr\_hl=zh-TW&\_x\_tr\_pto=sc Back * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790123 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆腐健康嗎？ 2018-05-02 **豆腐健康嗎？** 豆腐是一種由大豆液體製成的軟蛋白食品 - 稱為豆漿 - 已經凝固。得到的凝乳形成固體，可以切成薄片或將其加入菜餚中。豆腐具有許多健康益處，可作為健康飲食的一部分，用作肉類替代品。這種大豆產品是一種多功能食品，可用於從烤製到烘焙的各種食品。 **對健康的益處** 大豆豆腐的製作是為了減少高膽固醇，預防某些癌症，減少與骨質疏鬆症相關的骨質流失和改善更年期症狀。豆腐含有豐富的蛋白質，含有所有必需氨基酸，被稱為蛋白質的基本成分。提供所有必需氨基酸的食品被認為是完整的蛋白質食品。 **心臟健康** 豆腐和其他豆製品中的大豆蛋白可能通過降低低密度脂蛋白或壞膽固醇來控制心髒病的風險。美國食品和藥物管理局承認，每天至少25克大豆蛋白可能對心臟有益。請參閱豆腐包裝上的食品標籤，以確定滿足此25 g建議的份量。 **女性健康** 豆腐還含有一種叫做異黃酮的物質，特別是一種叫做植物雌激素的異黃酮。植物雌激素是植物性化合物，其模仿人體激素雌激素。由於這種聯繫，大豆被認為有助於預防激素相關的癌症，如乳腺癌和子宮內膜癌。大豆中的異黃酮也被認為有助於逆轉導致骨質疏鬆症和更年期婦女經歷的潮熱的骨質流失。然而，馬里蘭大學醫學中心指出，需要更多的研究來確定大豆對所有這些疾病的真正健康影響。 **菜單建議** 豆腐風味溫和，以其烹製的任何風味而聞名，為其添加的菜餚和飲料提供質地和蛋白質。豆腐有不同的稠度，無論是堅實的，柔軟的還是最光滑的，都是絲質的。堅實的豆腐可以切成薄片，加入油炸或調味，如肉類，並作為肉類替代品小心地烤。軟豆腐可以製成泥狀，用作烤寬麵條中的意大利乳清乾酪替代品，或者搗碎並添加到砂鍋菜中。絲綢豆腐適合與水果，蜂蜜和少量冰塊混合製作冰沙。它的質地也很光滑，適合在蘸料或澆頭中使用。 由 LAURA MORGAN 2017年10月3日 https://www.livestrong.com/article/378597-is-tofu-healthy-to-eat/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 大豆蛋白和膽固醇 2023-05-30 **大豆蛋白和膽固醇** 如果您正在努力改善膽固醇水平，那麼在您的炒菜中加入豆腐，在早餐的燕麥片中加入豆漿，或者將毛豆作為零食都是不錯的選擇。 俄勒岡州波特蘭市心臟病專家 James Beckerman 醫學博士說，一些研究表明大豆蛋白可能有幫助。但證據並不充分，因此您肯定希望通過其他方式改變飲食以幫助降低膽固醇。 吃大豆食品可能有助於將低密度脂蛋白（“壞”）膽固醇降低約 3%。這很少，但是當你試圖利用你能做的一切來降低膽固醇時，這是值得考慮的。大豆也是蛋白質、纖維和有益心臟健康的 omega-3 脂肪酸的良好來源（雖然與鮭魚或金槍魚中的不一樣）。此外，大豆天然不含膽固醇且飽和脂肪含量低。 **吃什麼** 最好的獲益方式是將豆製品換成您通常食用的動物脂肪含量高的食物： 1. 嘗試用大豆替代雞肉，例如硬豆腐。 2. 試試大豆蛋白，而不是碎牛肉。 3. 不要選擇普通的熱狗，而是選擇大豆熱狗。 4. 嘗試喝豆漿，而不是喝牛奶。檢查標籤以確保它強化了鈣和維生素 D，並且含糖量不太高。 5. 代替黃油，使用大豆堅果黃油。 6. 嘗試大豆奶酪而不是高脂奶酪。 7. 享用一杯毛豆，而不是加工過的零食。 有一個例外：大豆補充劑。在您的飲食中添加大豆異黃酮補充劑並沒有被證實的益處。改用全豆類食品。 **另外三件事要記住：** 醬油和大豆油不含大豆蛋白，儘管“大豆”是它們名稱的一部分。 閱讀標籤。確保您購買的豆製品的飽和脂肪、膽固醇、鹽和添加糖含量也較低。 如果您在包裝食品上看到“大豆”，那是大豆的另一個詞。 **吃多少** 如果您不熟悉吃大豆，請一次在您的飲食中添加一點。每週幾次用大豆蛋白代替動物蛋白食品。這是減少飽和脂肪和降低整體疾病風險的最佳方法。有一點很長的路要走。最好的飲食是含有多種食物的飲食，例如水果、蔬菜、堅果、種子、全麥和豆類。這比大豆製品含量過高的飲食要好。 適量吃大豆應該沒問題。但是慢慢來，看看你是怎麼做的。這種情況很少見，但有些人在吃大豆時會出現消化問題（如胃痛、稀便或腹瀉）。其他人對大豆過敏。此外，“有些人擔心過多的大豆會對荷爾蒙產生負面影響，尤其是對男性，”貝克曼說。對此存在一些爭議。請諮詢您的醫生或營養師，了解您的飲食中應該包含多少大豆。 By Kara Mayer Robinson https://www.webmd.com/cholesterol-management/features/soy-and-cholesterol 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 黃豆製品營養價值高 食藥署教你這樣吃才健康 2021-03-23 在天然食物之中，黃豆的營養豐富且富含植物性蛋白質，又可製成各種加工品，但許多人對於黃豆加工製成的豆漿、豆花及豆腐等的營養價值是否流失感到疑惑。食藥署表示，黃豆直接生吃可能會消化不良，不過一般的黃豆加工品都會經過充分的加熱步驟，確實會破壞其中的營養成分，但也相對提高人體對蛋白質的攝取量。 事實上，蛋白質在遇到酸、鹼、加熱、重金屬等環境時，會改變其化學結構，豆類加工製品即是利用這一特性製成，最明顯的是會改變其溶解度，同時減少活性，例如，在鹹豆漿中加入白醋，環境變酸之後，會使豆漿中的蛋白質變性，所浮現出來的白色碎塊物質就是蛋白質。 常在早餐中出現的豆漿，其作法是將黃豆清洗、打碎、過濾並烹煮而得的液體成品，過濾留下的固體部分為豆渣，有了豆漿，可以完成大多數的豆類製品，而豆渣中含有許多纖維質，也可以做成素肉、素丸子，或是炒乾製成素肉鬆。 若將豆漿持續加熱，豆漿與空氣的交界處，蛋白質會凝結成薄膜，這層薄膜就是豆皮，用工具挑起薄膜晾乾定型，然後曬乾或油炸，就是常見火鍋料中的豆皮，也稱之為腐皮或腐竹；在豆漿中加入凝固劑，如鹽鹵或石膏，利用其中的鎂離子、鈣離子與蛋白質反應，使蛋白質沉澱出來，即製成豆腐；點鹵後的豆漿持續靜置凝固，就會成為常見的點心豆花或豆腐腦。 豆乾的製作則接續傳統豆腐的製程，將豆腐切塊後再次加壓排水，則可以完成一般沒有上色的「白豆乾」。白豆乾因為富含蛋白質與水分，一般來說容易腐敗，較不易存放。將白豆乾放入糖烏（煮過焦化的麥芽糖）煮過上色，可以減少水分、延長保存時間，就是日常看到的咖啡色豆乾。 豆類是極佳的蛋白質來源，而黃豆的成分約有36%是蛋白質，另含33%的碳水化合物與16%油脂，若要從黃豆中攝取蛋白質，直接吃黃豆的攝取率相對較低，反倒是經過加工處理的豆類製品，因蛋白質變性，能幫助人體增加蛋白質的攝取，這也是食品加工的其中一個神奇之處。 BY NOW Health Huang Yuting/Compiling report https://healthmedia.com.tw/main\_detail.php?id=23149 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【Towards the Happiness: Sustainable Earth, Starting with Action!】 2023-11-27 **【****Towards the Happiness: Sustainable Earth, Starting with Action!****】** **First Stop: Environmental Sustainability** According to the Global Consumer Insights Report, the global cost of living continues to rise, leading consumers to significantly adjust their spending behaviors. Approximately 80% of consumers are willing to pay higher prices for sustainably produced goods, such as local farm products or those with lower carbon footprints. Over 40% of consumers indicate they are willing to pay a premium of up to 10% for sustainable products, while 10% express a willingness to pay a premium of up to 30%. Consumers no longer focus solely on the quality and safety of products; brands recognized as trustworthy and demonstrating a commitment to environmental sustainability are deemed more competitive in the market. **Second Stop: Moving Forward Bravely** TaTiHsing has implemented a comprehensive carbon footprint tracking initiative in response to ISO 14067 standards to ensure carbon emissions comply with international norms. We deeply believe that investing in green production and environmental protection is not only about staying competitive but also a social duty that responsible companies must fulfill. In terms of the social responsibility of corporation, we have made significant advance in paperless information integrated in cloud systems, solar energy generation, and other aspects. We aim to achieve environmental sustainability and strive towards green manufacturing by implementing methods such as energy conservation, waste reduction, and efficiency improvement. We are dedicated to keeping responsibilities to the environment, society, and stakeholders, committed to creating a greener, healthier, and sustainable future. **Third Stop: The Road to Happiness** Achieving the net-zero transition in 2050 is the well-known global consensus. TaTiHsing definitely believes in the significance of this goal, positively seeking various decarbonization strategies and accelerating its transformation to be a green enterprise. Our target is to be the leading global supplier of automated soybean food equipment. In 2023, TaTiHsing stood out among others with outstanding overall operational performance, research and development capabilities, quality control policies, and marketing services, earning the National Brand Yu Shan Award for 'Outstanding Enterprise.' This prize validates our ongoing efforts and serves as the best assurance of confidence for our customers. We believe that each effort is the key toward the happiness! * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆腐對痛風患者有好處 2023-07-28 **豆腐對痛風患者有好處?** 豆腐，長期以來一直是東方的一種流行食品。隨著純素飲食日益流行，它也越來越頻繁地出現在西方菜單上。然而，關於豆腐對痛風患者是好還是壞，大眾一直存在一些疑慮。 在過去，一些醫療保健專業人士建議痛風易發的人群盡量減少豆腐和大豆的食用。2011 年發表在《亞太臨床營養學雜誌》上的一項研究反映了人們對豆腐和痛風的舊態度。該研究調查了亞洲營養師和醫生的意見，發現這些醫療保健專業人員中近一半（48%）認為大豆食品可能導致痛風。然而最近，有專家意見表明，食用豆腐對於痛風患者來說根本不是問題，甚至可能有幫助。 **痛風與飲食的聯繫** 關節炎基金會解釋說，痛風是一種由血液中高濃度尿酸引起的炎症性關節炎。過量的尿酸會在關節（通常是大腳趾、腳踝或膝蓋）中形成針狀晶體，導致突然、嚴重的疼痛、壓痛、發紅和腫脹。稱為嘌呤的膳食成分會增加尿酸，增加您患痛風的機會。 梅奧診所表示，痛風飲食患者可能需要避免或少吃富含嘌呤的食物，包括肝、腎、胸腺等內臟、紅肉和某些類型的海鮮，如鳳尾魚、貝類、沙丁魚和金槍魚。（他們補充說，吃魚的總體健康益處通常會超過痛風患者的風險。） By Angela Dowden https://www.livestrong.com/article/401189-eating-tofu-for-gout/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【完美規劃，只為呈現最佳的服務】 2023-01-19 **【完美規劃，只為呈現最佳的服務】** 2022是非常不容易的一年，疫情帶來的轉變，加快了數位化與自動化經濟轉型，而我們的腳步，從未停歇。面對疫情下，大地興團隊從業務、研發、採購、品管、電機到製造生產，以最完整的生產線服務作為因應，並採取高標準作業，使生產效率達到完美。 大地興不斷地在黃豆市場的國際走向以及趨勢進行觀察，對於每筆訂單，經由反覆的分析及溝通，都能充分達到顧客之需求，進而設計與製作。產線相關作業皆以國際(ISO)準則作為基礎規範，並發揮最佳效能作業。出貨時，亦有相同品質之要求及完善的出貨標準，從複查訂單作業與雙向溝通訂定排程，依據設備出貨流程嚴謹執行，並由排程人員決定最佳出貨方式、選用特定的集貨工具、調派集貨作業，決定所運送車輛的大小與數量。 我們秉持著豐富經驗及熱誠的心，確保每一位顧客得到最佳服務品質。更憑借優質的出貨準則和良好的信譽，取得了一次又一次優異的成績。新年到來，大地興機器廠枕戈待旦，讓我們成為您事業藍圖中最堅實的夥伴。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 兒童食用大豆對健康的影響 2024-06-18 **兒童食用大豆對健康的影響** 大豆是一種營養豐富的食物，具有許多健康益處，有助於兒童的生長和發育。大豆食品可以為兒童飲食提供多種重要的營養素，例如蛋白質、必需脂肪酸、鈣、鉀和葉酸。 與成人一樣，大豆蛋白可以降低兒童的循環膽固醇水平，並且有有趣的證據表明，兒童時期每天食用 1 份大豆就可以顯著降低以後患乳癌的風險。涉及亞洲和基督復臨安息日會人群的流行病學研究以及臨床研究支持大豆食品的安全性。 大豆食品在美國是越來越受歡迎的食物選擇。美國人喜歡傳統的亞洲大豆食品，如味噌、納豆、豆豉、毛豆和豆腐，也食用大豆成分，包括大豆分離蛋白、大豆濃縮蛋白和大豆粉/組織化植物蛋白，作為大豆肉類和乳製品類似物的成分。隨著美國人對植物性飲食、純素食/素食飲食模式和非動物性蛋白質來源越來越感興趣，大豆及其如何對兒童飲食做出積極貢獻的議題變得越來越重要。據估計，18 至 34 歲的年輕人中有 6% 認為自己是素食主義者。這些年輕人中的許多人即將成為父母，這導致人們對如何將大豆納入兒童飲食越來越感興趣。 **營家長關心的問題****-*****荷爾蒙水平和青春期*** 儘管研究有限，但證據表明大豆不會影響循環激素水平。 世界上大部分地區的兒童進入青春期的時間都較早。這一事態發展引起了人們的極大關注。可能導致初經提早的因素包括肥胖增加和動物性蛋白質攝取量增加。由於大豆食品含有異黃酮，因此人們有興趣確定大豆攝取量是否會影響月經初潮。雖然關於這個主題的研究有限，但一項涉及 327 名美國基督復臨安息日會女孩的研究表明，即使攝取大量含大豆蛋白的食物（每週 24 份）也與月經開始的年齡無關。 Author By Connie Liakos，MS Editor https://www.soyconnection.com/old-pages/resources/health-nutrition-newsletter/health-nutrition-newsletter-details/health-impact-of-childhood-soy-consumption 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soy Does Not Affect Puberty 2021-09-17 Soy products do not affect onset of menarche for girls, according to a new study in the *Nutrition Journal*. Girls in the United States are experiencing puberty earlier in their lives – increasing their risk for diseases such as breast cancer – with several theories regarding its cause. Some studies have focused on dietary factors, such as animal protein and dairy and soy product intake. Researchers of this study examined the diets of 327 girls who consumed a wide variety and amount of soy products during their lives to conclude it has no effect on the age at onset of menarche. You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Amino Acids in Soy Protein 2018-06-01 # Amino Acids in Soy Protein The protein in food is made up of amino acids, and the quality of that protein is based on the number and types of amino acids it contains. Animal foods contain high-quality protein, and egg white has the highest quality protein of all. Unlike other plant or vegetable proteins, soy protein contains all of the essential amino acids necessary for good health. That makes soy protein a complete protein, similar to the protein found in animal foods. ## **Types** Of the 20 amino acids your body needs to build proteins required for normal growth and maintenance of health, 9 are called essential amino acids, because they cannot be made by your body and must come from your diet, according to MedlinePlus.com. The 9 essential amino acids, found in soy protein and many animal foods, are histidine, isoleucine, leucine, lysine, methionine, phenylalanine, threonine, tryptophan and valine. Arginine is essential for children but not adults. There are also 10 nonessential amino acids, found in various foods and in different combinations with some or all of the essential amino acids. Your body can make these nonessential amino acids if they are not provided by your diet. ## **Function** Soy protein breaks down in your digestive system into amino acids that are absorbed into your bloodstream and travel throughout your body. In the process, some of these amino acids combine with others to form various types of protein that provide structure to your organs and tissues and play roles in various body processes. Some amino acids in soy protein also function as hormones, enzymes and other active substances in the body. As a last resort, your body can also use protein to produce energy when carbohydrates and fats are unavailable. ## **Sources** The amino acids in soy protein are found in varying amounts and combinations in tofu, soy flour, soy milk, textured soy protein, soy meat substitutes, miso, which is a fermented soybean paste, soybeans and edamame, which are green soy beans. ## **Limitations** Two essential amino acids in soy protein, methionine and lysine, are present only in small amounts. According to U.S. Department of Agriculture research published in the "Journal of Agricultural and Food Chemistry," this limitation, combined with the number of people who have soy allergies and difficulty digesting soy protein, means that soy protein does not compare as favorably with animal protein for some people as for others. * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 2018-09-15 **現場冠蓋雲集、氣氛熱烈** 《大地興新廠落成系列活動》 今(15)日大地興機器廠股份有限公司舉辦大溪廠落成剪綵典禮，由董事長卓建旺及總經理卓駿宏，率全體員工，邀請桃園經發局副局長黃穗鵬先生、桃園第一分區扶輪社先進，及來自加拿大、澳洲、日本、新加坡、泰國、馬來西亞等全球客戶來台參與，同時邀請國內知名豆腐、豆干大廠如義美、統一、西北、春豐、大漢等總經理，以及各縣市豆腐公會前後任理事長、大溪豆干業者代表蒞臨盛會，現場熱鬧滾滾，政商界貴賓雲集。 身為扶輪社3502桃園第一分區助理總監（AG）的卓建旺董事長，亦藉新廠落成活動，邀集桃園區扶輪社先進辦理職業參訪，展示新一代黃豆食品設備，連同大地興長年合作的供應鏈廠商、同業好友等逾300人到場同慶，充分展現長期深耕桃園在地企業的研發能量與奮鬥精神。 剪綵儀式後，邀請現場來賓共同舉行感恩餐會，邀請市長鄭文燦先生蒞臨致詞。鄭市長表示，大地興於桃園深耕黃豆設備產業近一甲子，經過不斷創新轉型，從傳統磨豆機轉變成全自動化黃豆食品設備製造，三代傳承迄今，可說是桃園在地優良中小企業的代表。市府未來將於大溪埔頂公園設立豆干博物館的計畫，需要專業團隊的參與，現場更提出邀請卓建旺董事長擔任豆干博物館顧問的提議，現場氣氛熱烈。 下午接續舉行2018年第二屆全球豆製品廠商高峰會，此五年一度的盛會，知名食品大廠如義美、佳格、川武、春豐食品等，皆由總經理或高級主管出席參與。大地興特別聘請日本豆製品設備業領導品牌YSP、SOEI公司營業部長，偕同新加坡知名食品大廠統一食品前廠長，擔任峰會講師，現場分享全球豆製品最先進的全豆與無型箱包布設備新知，引發與會者熱烈討論，直呼不虛此行！ 卓建旺董事長表示，使用大地興公司設備，從事黃豆食品（豆奶、豆腐、豆干）生產的優良食品大廠，迄今已廣布全球五大洲數十個城市。大地興秉持經營初衷，期望建立一個全球化的豆製品交流平台，讓全球客戶能透過這個平台，廣泛的分享各國不同品質、特色的產品，同時可以交換業界內最新的豆品知識，共同將豆製品產業發揚光大。 總經理卓駿宏亦表示，因應全球化養生食品趨勢，近年來全世界各國對營養、天然的黃豆食品需求直線上升，作為台灣黃豆食品設備領頭羊的大地興，為順應全球市場產能擴增需求，於今(15)日啟用大溪新廠，更響應政府綠能政策，採用太陽能板發電，未來將持續努力，積極拓展國際並持續深化國內市場，希望能提供更有效率、更環保、更安全的黃豆食品設備予業界，同時將MIT台灣製造的優質設備推廣到全世界。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

TatiHsing was awarded the 2019 Taoyuan City Industrial Innovation R&D Program Excellent Manufacturer! 2019-11-11 **Congrats! TatiHsing was awarded the 2019 Taoyuan City Industrial Innovation R&D Program Excellent Manufacturer!** Taoyuan city Mayor, Mr. Zheng-Wencan said at the "2019 Local Industry Innovation R&D Promotion Projects press conference" on the 4th Nov. that small and medium-sized enterprises are flexible and pragmatic. Taoyuan has implemented local industry innovation R&D program since 2012, and will continue to give support to small and medium-sized enterprises to help the industry achieves "Made in Taiwan", "Made in Taoyuan", and also "Money in Taoyuan". The local Small Business Innovation Research results presentation will demonstrate the R&D project achievements of five major categories including “Metal Machinery”, “Daily Commodities”, “Food and Biotechnology Pharmaceuticals”, “Innovative Services” and “Electronics Finance” to show the vitality and development potential of small and medium-sized enterprises. TatiHsing is in the field of "Metal Machinery" and has won the highest subsidy with "Full-function Automatic Soymilk Machine". The mayor has affirmed the efforts of TatiHsing dedicated to the professional soy products machinery development for nearly 60 years in Taoyuan. The mayor also encouraged TatiHsing to keep striving for excellence on the soybean machinery, and continues to work hard for Taoyuan as Taoyuan is the key city of soy products. * 黃豆知識/ * 豆腐如何促進健康？ 2023-03-10 **豆腐如何促進健康？** 基於大豆的蛋白質（如豆腐）具有許多健康益處。 **預防冠心病** 豆腐中的異黃酮——一種以抗氧化和抗炎特性而聞名的化合物——有助於保持心臟健康。例如，2020 年發表在《循環》雜誌上的一項研究檢查了超過 100,000 人的數據。研究人員發現，與每月吃豆腐少於一次的人相比，每周至少吃一份豆腐可降低患冠心病的風險。 “大豆可能有助於降低血壓，從而降低患心血管疾病和中風的風險，”弗賴里希補充道。 **降低膽固醇水平** 豆腐還有助於降低低密度脂蛋白膽固醇（“壞”膽固醇），以及適度降低甘油三酯和適度增加高密度脂蛋白膽固醇（“好”膽固醇）。 在 2019 年發表在《營養學雜誌》上的一項研究中，研究人員分析了 46 項研究，發現大豆可顯著降低成人的“壞”膽固醇約 3% 至 4%。 **促進記憶力和大腦健康** 儘管研究尚不完全清楚，但有一些證據表明豆腐和其他以大豆為基礎的食物有助於改善認知功能，例如記憶力和解決問題的能力。 2020 年發表在《阿爾茨海默氏症與癡呆症：轉化研究和臨床干預》雜誌上的一項研究表明，牛尿酚是一種在腸道中因食用大豆製品而產生的代謝物，可能有助於降低患癡呆症的風險。據研究人員稱，通過食用豆製品攝入大量雌馬酚的人的白質病變數量是雌馬酚水平低的人的一半，白質病變是阿爾茨海默氏病的危險因素。 豆腐中的葉酸也會對您的心理健康產生積極影響。根據美國國立衛生研究院的說法，葉酸缺乏與抑鬱症的高風險有關。 **緩解更年期症狀** 豆腐中的大豆成分可能對更年期女性有益。 在 2021 年發表在《更年期》雜誌上的一項研究中，研究人員檢查了絕經後的順性別女性。他們發現，在低脂植物性飲食中加入半杯大豆可減少 84% 的潮熱（更年期症狀）。 Freirich 解釋說，在大豆和豆腐中發現的異黃酮模仿雌激素對身體的影響。在更年期前後的時間裡，您體內的雌激素含量會減少。 因此，通過在飲食中加入豆腐，可以幫助抑制任何不適症狀。這些症狀包括潮熱、大量和不規則的月經出血以及情緒變化。 **降低骨質疏鬆症的風險** 鈣可以強健骨骼，一些豆腐富含鈣。11強壯的骨骼對於預防骨質疏鬆症至關重要，骨質疏鬆症是更年期由於雌激素減少而導致的常見副作用。 **可能會降低某些癌症的風險** 一些研究表明，定期攝入大豆有助於減緩某些癌症的進展或減少其複發。 2017 年發表在《營養學》雜誌上的一項研究發現，被診斷患有前列腺癌的人可能會發現，食用豆腐和其他大豆類食物會使他們的前列腺特異性抗原水平保持在較低水平。這有助於癌症進展緩慢或根本不進展。 但圍繞大豆對前列腺癌影響的證據是相互矛盾的。2017 年發表在《國際癌症雜誌》上的另一項研究發現，食用大豆類食物實際上可能會增加患侵襲性前列腺癌的風險。 同時，根據國家醫學圖書館的說法，豆腐中發現的異黃酮可以降低患乳腺癌和卵巢癌的風險。然而，攝入大豆對絕經後人群預防乳腺癌和卵巢癌的影響仍然難以捉摸。 **其他潛在的健康益處** 食品和飲料加工文章 的作者還指出，豆腐具有以下潛在益處： *肌肉健康* *大腦健康改善* *血糖調節* *抗衰老特性* *增強免疫力* *體重減輕* *預防偏頭痛、腎臟疾病、肝損傷、貧血和脫髮* **大豆爭議** 在 1990 年代，一些人對豆腐和其他含有異黃酮的大豆食品提出了與癌症有關的擔憂，這些異黃酮模仿雌激素對身體的影響。然而，營養指導組織 Culina Health 的聯合創始人Vanessa Rissetto, RDN指出，研究人員密切調查了這些食物在慢性病預防和治療中的作用。 “大豆可能會對某些人產生不利影響，但擔憂主要來自對囓齒動物的研究，”Rissetto 告訴Health。此外，過去的研究表明，豆腐中所含的這種合成雌激素不足以增加患乳腺癌的風險。 “歐洲食品安全局 (EFSA) 和北美更年期協會都發現植物雌激素不會增加患乳腺癌的風險，”Freirich 解釋說。“當然，研究一直在進行，以更多地了解不同的組織和不同的人對我們食物中的成分有何反應。” Freirich 還承認對大豆製品和服用甲狀腺藥物的人的甲狀腺功能衰竭的擔憂。然而，2018 年發表在《內分泌學前沿》雜誌上的一項研究發現，參與者在食用這些產品後甲狀腺功能沒有發生統計學上的顯著變化。 但 Freirich 敦促您仍然“在大幅增加豆製品攝入量之前先諮詢您的 [醫療保健提供者]。” 請記住，大豆是一種常見的食物過敏原，尤其是在幼兒中。根據美國過敏、哮喘和免疫學學院 (ACAAI) 的說法，對大豆的過敏反應通常出現在嬰兒和三歲以下的兒童身上。但是許多孩子在童年時期就不再對大豆過敏了。 **如何煮豆腐** 在你烹飪和享受它之前，一定要準備好你的豆腐。它裝在水里，所以第一步是盡可能多地去除液體。Yule 使用了紅奶酪壓榨機，但也推薦了在兩個加重盤之間壓豆腐的老式方法。 為了最大限度地發揮豆腐的健康益處，Yule 建議不要油炸或使用含糖過多的醬汁。 “它就像一張空白的畫布，一種美妙的享受方式是用芝麻油和低鈉醬油醃製，然後風炸，”Yule 說。 您也可以烘烤、煎、烤、炒或炒豆腐。對於特別健康的一餐，Freirich 建議用非澱粉類蔬菜佔盤子的 50%，豆腐佔 25%，糙米等全穀物 佔25%。 一般來說，豆腐的種類決定了你應該如何烹製它以獲得最佳效果。中等和柔軟的品種非常適合涉及粉碎或混合的食譜。另一方面，根據營養與營養學學院的說法，堅硬和超堅硬的品種最適合燒烤或煎炸，以及烘焙和炒菜。絲豆腐主要是液體，最適合做湯、蘸醬、醬汁、布丁和冰沙。 如果您想嘗試豆腐但不打算立即使用它，您可以按照美國農業部的規定將其冷凍。17為此，您需要將水瀝乾，拍幹，然後切片。美國農業部表示，將豆腐放入密封容器中，可以在冰箱中存放長達三個月。然後，當你準備好使用它時，把它放在冰箱裡解凍一夜。 **關於豆腐的其他注意事項** “適量食用豆腐對大多數人都有益，但即使是健康食品也可能過量食用，”Yule 說。食品和飲料加工文章對此表示同意，並指出豆腐會導致胃腸道問題（例如脹氣、腹脹或噁心）、頭痛或發燒。 Freirich 指出，如果您服用單胺氧化酶抑製劑 (MAOI)，您還應該與您的醫療保健提供者討論食用豆腐的問題。豆腐中發現的一種氨基酸是酪胺，它有助於平衡血壓。然而，MAOI 會阻斷分解酪胺的蛋白質。將豆腐和 MAOI 結合使用可能會導致危險的高血壓，具體取決於您的劑量。 By Claire Gillespie https://www.health.com/nutrition/is-tofu-healthy 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * On the 18th, Mayor Chang Shan-Cheng attended the “2023 Local SBIR Achievement Presentation,” encouraging Taoyuan enterprises to seize the wave of AI to enhance their competitiveness, and congratulating 50 elite companies for passing the SBIR review, showcasing impressive innovation results. TaTiHsing has made remarkable contributions to environmental sustainability and industrial upgrades by developing a "new soy milk filtration device—the Cone type centrifugal filter," significantly boosting soy milk production efficiency and soybean utilization. The mayor commended TaTiHsing on-site, encouraging them to strive for excellence and lead Taoyuan, the hub of soy products, to new heights. Taoyuan will continue supporting local enterprises in their transformation and upgrades, focusing on smart manufacturing, and creating endless possibilities! * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 大豆可能會提高生育能力並有助於潮熱 2022-06-02 大豆似乎對生育有益，只要你不吃太多。接受體外受精的女性在環境中暴露於 BPA，如果她們也吃大豆，她們更有可能懷孕。研究人員說，這可能是因為大豆的異黃酮有助於中和 BPA 的內分泌干擾作用。 只是不要過火。*《營養學雜誌》**的*一篇評論發現，每天攝入超過 100 毫克的大豆異黃酮（相當於 6 盎司生豆豉或 16 杯豆漿）與卵巢功能下降有關。但適度的大豆消費並沒有造成問題。 至於大豆解決那些伴隨更年期而來的煩人的、破壞性的潮熱？它可能會有所幫助，但並不適合所有人。*一項更年期*研究發現，在身體產生大豆代謝物雌馬酚的女性中，與吃得最少的人相比，吃大豆最多的人的潮熱和盜汗明顯減少。（20% 到 50% 的北美和歐洲女性會產生雌馬酚。一些研究中心可以在尿液樣本中對其進行檢測，但有一個更簡單的選擇：嘗試在飲食中添加大豆 4 到 6 週，看看會發生什麼。如果有幫助，你會產生雌馬酚。如果沒有，你可能不會，研究作者說。） AUTHOR BY MARYGRACE TAYLOR AND KATE ROCKWOOD https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/health/diet-nutrition/a20707020/is-soy-good-or-bad-for-you/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

In this warm and loving month, TaTiHsing aided local disadvantaged groups. We support the purchase of handmade cookies from the Taoyuan City Government's sheltered workshop for individuals with intellectual disabilities. This initiative targets to build confidence in these individuals, fostering their self-reliance. Through actual actions, we spread love and care to society, creating a warm and supportive environment being aware of the self-worth of every member. **One Gift, Two Happiness.** Through the 'Christmas party' event, our company has cultivated an atmosphere filled with love and joy. This not only provided a heartwarming holiday experience for our employees to get together to celebrate Christmas, but also deepened the emotional connections among us. It has fostered a warm and vibrant working environment, solidifying our company's unity and cohesion further. At TaTiHsing, we deeply understand that social responsibility is a necessary part for the business. While running our operations, we aim to contribute to society beyond our business scope. During Christmas, we sustainably use love to light up the stars. By ordering gift boxes to fulfill charitable objectives, embodying the core value of corporate sustainability. This is our ongoing dedication to spreading love to society. High-quality equipment is presented perfectly. 2022-10-11 **TA TI HSING keeps close tabs on quality inspection and tests. High-quality equipment is presented perfectly.** Customer came to the factory of TA TI HSING to inspect the "Automatic tofu continuous presser" this time. Perfect mechanical structure and electrical materials are in line with CE certification. TA TI HSING tailor-made the automatic carrier and pneumatic conveying equipment according to the needs of customers, carefully observed and understood the needs, solved problem, and made customers feel humanized and convenient. Automation is a trend, which can solve the shortage of manpower and reduce the time of manual operation without manual operation, so as to make full use of resources to reduce costs, improve product quality and production efficiency. All along, we have been constantly improving whatever we do to make the best better; focusing on research and development, manufacturing advanced fully automated equipment, improving quality and output, and being able to solve customers' intractable problems in the manufacturing process. We hope to carry forward the traditional Chinese culture of tofu through soybean machinery and equipment. Our supply scope covers all the machinery for soyfoods, such as soymilk, soy beverages, bean curd, tofu.......etc, from minimum size to the large scale. * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【用愛永續，點亮星光】 2023-12-25 **【用愛永續，點亮星光】** 一年一度的聖誕節到來，在這溫馨有愛的月份裡，大地興幫助在地弱勢團體，認購喜憨兒桃園市府庇護商店手工餅乾，為憨兒們建立自信，讓他們有自力更生的能力。我們通過實際行動向社會傳遞了愛與關懷，更將這份溫暖的公益力量，為憨兒們創建自我價值，讓每位成員都能感受到自己的重要性。 **一份付出，兩種美好** 透過舉辦「Christmas party」活動，公司營造了一個充滿愛與歡樂的氛圍，不僅為員工安排了溫馨的節慶體驗，共同歡度耶誕節，加深了彼此之間的情感連結，打造了富有溫暖和活力的工作環境，更進一步鞏固了企業的凝聚力和向心力。 大地興深知作為企業，擁有社會責任感是不可或缺的一部分，在公司營運之餘，也希望能善盡一份力量，對社會有所貢獻，聖誕節將用愛永續，點亮星光，藉由訂購禮盒，達到做公益良善的目的，更讓大地興實踐了企業永續的核心價值，為社會繼續奉獻愛心。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

Stinky Tofu Worth a Try 2023-02-15 **Adventurous? Stinky Tofu Worth a Try** In a recent New York Times article, Wu Hsu Pi-Ying, owner of Dai Family House of Unique Stink in Taipei, Taiwan, described reactions to stinky tofu, a fermented Taiwanese food. “Now and again a tour bus full of foreigners stops by. Some of them love it. Others will spit their first bite into a tissue.” I had the opportunity to visit this restaurant a few years ago and fell very much into the latter camp. In fact, I had to leave the restaurant before my order even arrived since I was so repelled by the smell alone. My Chinese colleagues, on the other hand, weren’t the least bit deterred. They finished their own orders as well as mine. I quickly found out, though, that some versions of stinky tofu are more palatable than others. Although it can be served steamed or cooked into soup, street vendors typically sell it as a deep-fried snack. There happened to be such a vendor right outside the restaurant, and the deep-fried version wasn’t half bad. While most of the soy consumed by ethnic Chinese is unfermented, stinky tofu is an exception in Taiwan where it’s considered to be the country’s national snack. Since it can be made using a number of different starter bacteria formulas, there are wide regional and individual variations in stinky tofu products. Traditionally, it’s steeped in a brine of fermented milk, vegetables and meat. Brines may also include dried shrimp, amaranth greens, mustard greens, bamboo shoots, and Chinese herbs. Although traditional production takes as long as several months, modern factories sometimes produce stinky tofu in just a day or two. This process adds the familiar odor to the tofu, but doesn’t ferment it completely. Like all traditional soyfoods, stinky tofu is a good source of isoflavones, compounds that may provide a number of health benefits. Stinky tofu is unique, however, in that it also contains good quantities of the isoflavonoid equol.1 In consumers of stinky tofu urinary equol levels are quite high, indicating good absorption of this compound. Equol is produced through the metabolism of the isoflavone daidzein by intestinal bacteria. There has been quite a bit of research on the potential health benefits of equol, including effects on skin and menopausal symptoms.3 But only about a third of westerners host the bacteria that convert daidzein into equol.4,5 This means that some Americans may not be reaping all of the benefits of eating soyfoods, especially when compared to Asians, who as a group are much more likely to produce equol. Eating stinky tofu may be the answer in this case. If you have an adventurous palate, it’s worth a try. You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soybeans Nutrition Facts 2017-01-02 **Soybeans Nutrition Facts** Soybeans (Glycine max) are a type of legume, native to eastern Asia. They are an important component of Asian diets and have been consumed for thousands of years. Today, they are mainly grown in Asia, and South and North America. In Asia, soybeans are often eaten whole, but in Western countries heavily processed soy products are much more common. Various soy products are available, including soy flour, soy protein, tofu, soy milk, soy sauce, and soybean oil. Soybeans contain antioxidants and phytonutrients that have been linked with various health benefits, while concerns have also been raised about adverse effects. Nutrition Facts Aside from water, soybeans are mainly composed of protein, but they also contain good amounts of carbs and fat. The table below contains information on all the basic nutrients in soybeans. ### Nutrition Facts: Soybeans, cooked, boiled - 100 grams | | Amount | | --- | --- | | Calories | 173 | | Water | 63 % | | Protein | 16.6 g | | Carbs | 9.9 g | | Sugar | 3 g | | Fiber | 6 g | | Fat | 9 g | | Saturated | 1.3 g | | Monounsaturated | 1.98 g | | Polyunsaturated | 5.06 g | | Omega-3 | 0.6 g | | Omega-6 | 4.47 g | | Trans fat | ~ | Soy Protein Soybeans are among the best sources of plant-based protein. The protein content of soybeans ranges from 36 to 56% of the dry weight. One cup of boiled soybeans (172 g) contains around 29 grams of protein. The nutritional value of soy protein is good, although the quality is not quite as high as animal protein. The main types of protein in soybeans are glycinin and conglycinin, which make up approximately 80% of the total protein content. These proteins may trigger allergic reactions in some people. Soybeans also contain bioactive proteins, such as lectin and lunasin, which may have anti-cancer properties. > BOTTOM LINE:Soybeans are a very rich source of plant-based protein, making them ideal for vegan diets. ◎An evidence-based nutrition article from our experts at Authority Nutrition. https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/foods/soybeans Back * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790123 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Edamame and Soybeans: The Dual Power of Plant-Based Protein 2024-09-20 **Edamame and Soybeans: The Dual Power of Plant-Based Protein** Did you know that humble edamame and soybeans are actually nutritional powerhouses? These two are not only key sources of protein for vegetarians and vegans but also offer a complete package of health benefits! Both edamame and soybeans contain all the essential amino acids, providing your body with the complete protein it needs to function properly. According to the USDA, it's recommended to consume about 5 1/2 ounces of protein from food, including soy products, each day. How impressive are they? Half a cup of edamame delivers 36% of your daily protein intake, while raw soybeans offer a staggering 73%! Not to mention, they’re packed with heart-healthy omega-3 fatty acids, polyunsaturated fats, and zero cholesterol — the perfect fit for today’s health-conscious lifestyles.For those on a low-carb diet, edamame is a great choice, with only 8.4 grams of carbs per 100 grams, allowing you to indulge guilt-free. **Supplies Essential Vitamins** Both forms of soy are nutrient dense in their vitamin-B content. Again, 100 grams of mature soybeans are a better source of the B vitamins than the green boiled edamame. B-vitamins profiles include: ***Thiamin —** soybeans: 73 percent DV; edamame: 13 percent* ***Riboflavin —** soybeans: 67 percent DV; edamame: 22 percent* ***Vitamin B5 —** soybeans: 15 percent DV; edamame: 4 percent* ***Vitamin B6 —** soybeans: 22 percent DV; edamame: 14 percent* ***Folate —** soybeans: 94 percent DV; edamame: 14 percent* Back * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790123 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【Twin Cities Veg fest: Exploring the Nutrition Miracle of Tofu】 2024-09-12 **【**Twin Cities Veg fest: Exploring the Nutrition Miracle of Tofu**】** Are you ready to a healthy and delicious challenge? On September 22, 2024, Harriet Island Regional Park in Saint Paul will host the Twin Cities Veg Fest, which is not only a cuisine party, but an exploratory journey of health and sustainable living! We especially recommend the "Tofu Time" event! Experts will be on-site to share the nutrition miracle of tofu, a superfood transformed from soybeans that can easily be daily diets and recognized for potentially reducing the risk of breast cancer. High protein and low saturated fat, tofu is not only beneficial for cardiovascular but can also boost your immunity. This is not just a celebration of healthy food, but also an event that expresses respect and appreciation for the coexistence of humans, animals, and the planet. Are you still struggling to find the best solution for producing nutritious tofu? Check it out to the experts at Ta Ti Hsing Tofu Machinery! With over 60 years of professional manufacturing experience, especially in soybean food production equipment, we have accumulated deep expertise and technical knowledge. Numerous food factories using our machines for soybean food production are now spread across dozens of cities worldwide. With this professional expertise, Ta Ti Hsing will help you effortlessly create healthy and delicious tofu, adding unique flavors and competitiveness to your products. * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【美國大豆：引領植物性蛋白質的未來】 2024-08-01 **【美國大豆：引領植物性蛋白質的未來】** 植物性蛋白質的浪潮來！隨著全球飲食潮流逐漸重視飲食健康和地球保護，黃豆以其豐富的營養及永續發展，已成為植物性蛋白質市場的首選。這巨大的市場機會能提供各位豆製品業者利用美國黃豆產業永續發展來吸引更多愛好豆奶豆腐的消費者。 想知道大豆是如何引領植物蛋白的未來嗎？讓大地興來說給您聽： • 完整蛋白質： 大豆是含有全部九種必需氨基酸的植物蛋白之一，使其可與動物蛋白相媲美。 • 永續農業發展：美國大豆農場在顯著提高產量的同時，還提高了土地、水和能源的效率。 • 健康益處：定期攝取大豆蛋白質可降低心臟病風險，並與降低中風和早逝風險有關。 • 創新科技：通過精準農業、GPS、人工智慧和衛星測繪等技術改善產量和永續發展。 • 巨大市場： 預計到2034年，植物性蛋白質市場將激增至425億美元。 隨著消費者不斷尋求健康及永續發展的食品選擇，美國大豆完美地滿足了這一需求，提供高品質蛋白質來源，支持健康與環保目標。 想深入了解美國大豆的資訊，發掘蛋白質如何塑造食品的未來嗎？請參考閱讀原文＞ U.S. Soy meets consumer demand 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【Towards 2050 Net Zero Emissions Green Sustainability TATIHSING】 2023-08-10 **【Towards 2050 Net Zero Emissions Green Sustainability TATIHSING】** **Taiwan Carbon Solution Exchange (TCX) officially opened on August 7th.** As the global ESG, sustainable development and net-zero issues continue to ferment, carbon credit and carbon trading are increasingly valued by all walks of life, and people's understanding of and demand for carbon credit continue to grow, the Taiwan Carbon Credit Exchange will become an important platform for promoting sustainable development and environmental protection. **What is Carbon Emission Credit?** In the past, carbon dioxide was emitted without any cost, which led to the continuous increase of global carbon emissions. Carbon credit represents the "Right to emit greenhouse gases." The mechanism is based on the concept of carbon pricing, whereby carbon emissions are measured and a cap-and-trade system is introduced so that carbon dioxide emissions must be paid for to ensure that the value of carbon is accurately priced. One carbon credit is equivalent to one metric ton of carbon emissions, allowing a country or enterprise to quantify and track the total amount of carbon reduction. With the signing of the Kyoto Protocol, carbon credit are gradually becoming a tradable commodity, allowing governments or private organizations to trade carbon credit in the carbon market. "Carbon Credit" plays a key role, the core purpose of which is to effectively control carbon emissions and ensure the rational allocation of carbon resources. It encourages companies and countries to actively reduce carbon emissions, promote environmental protection and sustainable development. Its value is not only in carbon Emission control is more about stimulating green innovation and technological advancement. This is a common challenge that requires global cooperation to inject more impetus into carbon emission reduction. **TATIHSING****Corporate Mission: Toward a Green and Sustainable Future** TATIHSING is well aware of the importance of net-zero transformation by 2050, actively seeking various carbon reduction solutions, and accelerating the transformation into a green enterprise. We are developing and applying smart factories and green production technologies , through the optimization of production processes and energy Effective management of usage reduces our carbon emissions. For the tracking of carbon inventory, we have launched a comprehensive plan to introduce ISO 14064-1 to ensure that carbon emissions comply with international trends. This is not only in line with the global trend of net-zero carbon emissions, but also as a responsible corporate social responsibility. So far it has been more than half a century. We are the oldest and most experienced company engaged in the manufacture of automation soyfood machinery in Taiwan. Our customers have so far spread over five continents and dozens of cities in the world. Most of them are excellent and leading manufacturers of soyfood locally. The most well-known manufacturers in Taiwan such as IMEI, Uni-President Enterprises Corporation, SeeBest, Chun-Feng, Ta Han Food and other large food manufacturers have all adopted our equipment. ● The spirit of “Tofu Machine Artisan” is upheld in our Company Motto. In modern society, concept for health-consciousness and healthful food is on the rise.We insist on making excellent manufacturing equipment which can make “plant proteins” soybean food and conform to international certification standards of GMP / HACCP / CE / CSA / UL, etc. The entire production process is controlled by PLC automatically. CIP automatic cleaning technology is adopted to make the whole plant soyfood manufacturing equipment the most sophisticated and suitable to meet customers' requirements (high degree of customization).We believe our customers can turn soybeans into gold (soybean food) with our machines. * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【健康首選──植物性蛋白來臨！】 2023-08-25 **【健康首選──植物性蛋白來臨！】** 近年來全球對環境保護和飲食健康的關注日益增加，世界各地紛紛提倡減少肉食對環境有益，在這種趨勢下，植物性蛋白成為越來越受歡迎的選擇。豆腐作為優秀的素食替代品，擁有豐富的植物性蛋白、礦物質和纖維，成為素食者、希望減少肉類攝入或追求健康飲食族群的最佳選擇。 大地興專營黃豆食品生產設備超過60年，秉持著豆腐機械職人精神，在這個植物性蛋白成為熱門選擇的時代，持續為黃豆食品產業提供優質全自動豆腐生產設備，讓更多普羅大眾可以享受到健康優質的豆製產品。 大地興透過完善的自動化設備生產豆腐，讓豆腐生產變得不再困難！從浸豆→洗豆→磨豆→煮漿→濾漿→凝固→壓水→切割→殺菌等製程工序，皆有相對應全製程專用設備，提供您產線規劃及技術支援，使生產過程更加高效穩定，並達到食品安全衛生的保障。 作為植物性蛋白的新寵，黃豆飲食相比其它食品，不僅擁有降低罹患心臟病風險的效果，更提供豐富植物性蛋白、零膽固醇、不飽和脂肪酸、維生素B、纖維、鐵、鈣和鋅等營養價值，滿足身體各種需求，有助於維持身體健康，成為養生首選。 豆腐不僅是美味食品，更引領著健康飲食的新浪潮，而大地興全自動生產線設備，擁有可靠的品質與優異性能，期望在豆腐生產上，能讓您感受到前所未有的創新體驗。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790123 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 台灣的食品良心，幕後的磨手大地興 2023-03-29 **台灣的食品良心，幕後的磨手大地興** 自疫情開始以來，越來越多訴求健康機能的飲料受到消費者關注。隨著機能性和營養價值產品市場的成長，消費者為了滿足不同場合需求和方便消費形式的需求也越來越大，SPINS調查機構發布市場對於需求機能飲料的成長趨勢，這些飲料均有明顯的健康訴求，尤其在疫情期間有倍數的成長，包括：豆奶、燕麥奶、無酒精飲料、機能性混合飲料、包裝水、益生菌…等各類飲品。而在全球植物奶市場展望中，也預計2027年植物奶市場將迅速擴大到預測期結束時，總收入將超過 270 億美元。 「友善土地，從喝豆漿開始」為禾乃川國產豆製所的經營理念，使用國產黃豆、進而提升豆製品的品質，更重要的是守護臺灣這片土地，縮短食物里程，減少進口在運送過程中的碳排放。而製做黃豆食品時，則採用大地興「職人一號」全功能自動化豆奶機，蒸氣高溫煮沸，完全無需添加消泡劑與增稠劑，直到測試濃度達到標準後，再經過濾漿，才正式完成濃度近10度的純濃豆漿，整個過程完全不放入任何添加物，製作最天然純淨的臺灣味。 豆漿生產過程中，都會先將黃豆泡水靜置進行磨漿，再將研磨後的生豆奶熬煮沸騰後，進行後續的加工程序。但因為黃豆中含有一種天然成分稱之為「皂素」，具有良好的起泡性，使其在研磨過程中容易產生如肥皂般的泡沫。這些氣泡除了會影響產品的口感，在加工的製程上也會因為大量的泡沫生成造成溢鍋，故為了確保最終產品的品質平穩安定，許多廠商在磨漿的過程中便會加入消泡劑。**「職人一號」**全功能自動化豆漿機，除了免使用消泡劑，能夠有效減少豆漿的流失，還能夠高效能的擠壓過濾讓豆奶的產出率更高，而特殊的加熱方式更增添了豆奶風味的濃醇香滑。大地興深入研發、極致工藝，以追求品質的決心為起點，致力創造更優質的設備產品、更貼心的服務，讓您使用安心、操作更放心!
