Ta Ti Hsing Machinery Co., Ltdhttps://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/specialized in the development of soybean processing equipmentsen-usSoybeans Nutrition Factshttps://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/msg47.html

Soybeans Nutrition Facts 

Soybeans (Glycine max) are a type of legume, native to eastern Asia.

They are an important component of Asian diets and have been consumed for thousands of years. Today, they are mainly grown in Asia, and South and North America.

In Asia, soybeans are often eaten whole, but in Western countries heavily processed soy products are much more common.

Various soy products are available, including soy flour, soy protein, tofu, soy milk, soy sauce, and soybean oil.

Soybeans contain antioxidants and phytonutrients that have been linked with various health benefits, while concerns have also been raised about adverse effects.

Nutrition Facts

Aside from water, soybeans are mainly composed of protein, but they also contain good amounts of carbs and fat.

The table below contains information on all the basic nutrients in soybeans.

Nutrition Facts: Soybeans, cooked, boiled - 100 grams

  Amount
Calories 173
Water 63 %
Protein 16.6 g
Carbs 9.9 g
Sugar 3 g
Fiber 6 g
Fat 9 g
Saturated 1.3 g
Monounsaturated 1.98 g
Polyunsaturated 5.06 g
Omega-3 0.6 g
Omega-6 4.47 g
Trans fat ~
 
 
Soy Protein

Soybeans are among the best sources of plant-based protein.

The protein content of soybeans ranges from 36 to 56% of the dry weight.

One cup of boiled soybeans (172 g) contains around 29 grams of protein.

The nutritional value of soy protein is good, although the quality is not quite as high as animal protein.

The main types of protein in soybeans are glycinin and conglycinin, which make up approximately 80% of the total protein content. These proteins may trigger allergic reactions in some people.

Soybeans also contain bioactive proteins, such as lectin and lunasin, which may have anti-cancer properties.

BOTTOM LINE:Soybeans are a very rich source of plant-based protein, making them ideal for vegan diets.
âAn evidence-based nutrition article from our experts at Authority Nutrition.
https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/foods/soybeans
 
Fri, 09 May 2014 09:31:52 +0800https://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/Company-Profile.htmlHealth Benefits of Soybeanshttps://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/msg59.html

Health Benefits of Soybeans

Like most whole foods, soybeans have a number of beneficial health effects.

Prevention of Breast and Prostate Cancer

Cancer is one of the leading causes of death in modern society.

Eating soy products has been linked with increased breast tissue in women, hypothetically increasing the risk of breast cancer.

However, most observational studies indicate that consumption of soy products may reduce the risk of breast cancer.

Studies also indicate a protective effect against prostate cancer in men.

A number of soybean components may be responsible for the potential cancer-preventive effects. These include isoflavones, lectin, and lunasin.

Exposure to isoflavones early in life may be particularly protective against breast cancer later in life.

Keep in mind that all of the human studies on this subject are so-called observational studies. They indicate an association between soy consumption and cancer, but do not prove causation.

BOTTOM LINE:Soybeans contain a number of plant compounds that may help prevent breast and prostate cancer.

Alleviation of Menopausal Symptoms

Menopause is the period in a woman's life when menstruation stops.

It is often associated with unpleasant symptoms, such as sweating, hot flashes, and mood swings, effects that are brought about by a reduction in estrogen levels.

Interestingly, Asian women, especially Japanese women, are less likely to experience symptoms related to menopause than Western women.

Dietary habits, such as the higher consumption of soy foods in Asia, may explain this difference.

Studies indicate that isoflavones, a family of phytoestrogens found in soybeans, may alleviate the symptoms of menopause.

Soy products do not affect all women in this way. Soy only seems to be effective in so-called equol producers, women who possess a type of gut bacteria able to convert isoflavones into equol.

Equol has been suggested to be responsible for many of the beneficial health effects of soy consumption.

Daily intake of 135 mg of isoflavones for one week, equivalent to 68 g of soybeans per day, reduced menopausal symptoms only in equol producers.

Traditionally, hormonal therapies have been used as a treatment for menopausal symptoms. Today, isoflavone supplements are widely used as an alternative treatment.

BOTTOM LINE:Eating soybeans may help alleviate the symptoms of menopause.

Bone Health

Osteoporosis is a condition characterized by reduced bone density and increased risk of fractures, especially in elderly women.

Consumption of soy products may reduce the risk of osteoporosis in women that have undergone menopause.

BOTTOM LINE:Soybeans may cut the risk of osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.

 

âAn evidence-based nutrition article from our experts at Authority Nutrition.

https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/foods/soybeans

 

Fri, 13 Jul 2018 09:14:56 +0800https://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/Company-Profile.htmlSoy Milk Advantages and Disadvantageshttps://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/msg60.html

Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages

    If you're allergic to dairy, lactose intolerant or you just aren't crazy about the taste of dairy milk, reach for soy milk as a comparable alternative. It generally has a longer shelf life than dairy milk, and some types of packaged soy milk can be stored at room temperature for months, which helps eliminate waste caused by food spoilage. Soy milk also has a number of nutritional advantages, although some varieties of soy milk come loaded with sugar, which can pose a health risk.

âHigh-Quality Protein

    Include soy milk in your diet as a source of protein. Unlike most plant-based proteins -- which contain some, but not all, of the amino acids you need in your diet -- soy contains all nine essential amino acids. Your body assembles these amino acids into new proteins, including antibodies essential for immune system function, structural proteins that hold your tissues together, and enzymes that help your cells produce energy. Each cup of unsweetened, plain soy milk provides 7 grams of protein.

âCalcium and Iron

    Drinking soy milk also helps boost your calcium and iron. Your body relies on the calcium from your diet to maintain dense and strong bone tissue. Without it, your body draws on your bones as a source of calcium, which reduces your bone density over time. A cup of unsweetened plain soy milk boasts a calcium content of 299 milligrams, which contributes 30 percent toward your recommended daily calcium intake. The iron in soy milk helps your red blood vessels function properly, helping ensure that all the tissues throughout your body get the oxygen they need. Each serving of soy milk provides 1.1 milligrams of iron -- 14 and 6 percent of the daily iron intakes recommended for men and women, respectively.

âRiboflavin and Vitamin B-12

    Soy milk also helps you consume B-complex vitamins, and serves as an especially rich source of riboflavin, or vitamin B-2, and vitamin B-12. Getting enough vitamin B-12 in your diet helps your cells produce DNA, aids in red blood cell function and also keeps your nerves healthy. A serving of soy milk provides 3 micrograms of vitamin B-12, more than the 2.4 micrograms you need each day. The riboflavin in soy milk helps your cells produce energy, and it also shields your DNA from damage. Drinking a cup of soy milk boosts your riboflavin by 0.51 milligrams -- 39 percent of the recommended daily intake for men and 46 percent for women.

â²Disadvantages: Separate Fact from Fiction

    Don't shy away from including soy milk in your diet out of a fear of soy -- the University of Maryland Medical Center notes that soy foods are safe for most people. The exceptions are those who have soy allergies and recent breast cancer patients. Because soy products, including soy milk, contain chemicals similar in structure to estrogen, a diet rich in soy might pose a health risk if you've recently had breast cancer, which is sometimes sensitive to estrogen. As a result, further research is needed to determine soy's safety after breast cancer.

However, some types of soy milk do have a major nutritional disadvantage because of their added sugar content. Added sugars boost your calories without offering nutritional value, and increase your risk of cardiovascular disease. Select unsweetened soy milk to minimize added sugar -- it contains just 1 gram of naturally occurring sugars and no added sugar. Chocolate and vanilla flavored soy milks, in contrast, contain 18 and 6 grams of added sugar per serving, respectively.

 

âBY SYLVIE TREMBLAY, MSC

https://www.livestrong.com/article/425074-soy-milk-advantages-and-disadvantages/

Thu, 25 Sep 2014 10:32:16 +0800https://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/Company-Profile.htmlHealth Benefits of Soy Milkhttps://www.tofu-machine.com.tw/msg/msg61.html

Health Benefits of Soy Milk

Soy milk, which is made from soaking, grinding and boiling soy beans with water, is a very nutritious drink. Soy is naturally high in essential fatty acids, proteins, fiber, vitamins and minerals. These nutrients provide energy and keep your body functioning at its optimum level. Below are the six most important health benefits you can acquire from drinking soy milk.

1. Improve Lipid Profile

The most important attribute of soy milk is its ability to improve your blood lipid profile. Unlike dairy milk, whichis high in saturated fat and cholesterol, soy milk fat is mostly unsaturated with zero cholesterol. The monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fatty acids in soy can inhibit the transport of cholesterol into your blood stream. Studies have shown that regular intake of soy can significantly lower you blood concentrations of triglyceride and low density lipoproteins (LDL) and raise the level of high density lipoproteins (HDL). This combined effect makes soy milk an ideal drink if you have high cholesterol or have a family history of coronary heart diseases.

2. Strengthen Blood Vessel Integrity

The omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids as well as the powerful phyto-antioxidants in soy can effectively protect your blood vessels from lesions and hemorrhage. These compounds bind to the blood vessel lining and defend your lining cells from free radical attacks and cholesterol deposits. The binding of these nutrients also improve the fluidity and flexibility of your blood vessels so that they are much more resilient to blood pressure changes.

3. Promote Weight Loss

Soy milk is naturally lower in sugar content than regular milk. Cow's milk has about 12 grams of sugar per cup as opposed to only 7 grams in soy milk. This is why a cup of whole soy milk has only 80 calories, which is the equivalent of skim milk. In addition, the monounsaturated fatty acid in soy milk can inhibit your intestinal absorption of fat, which is another great advantage for weight loss. Drinking soy milk also gives you an extra dose of fiber, keeping your feeling fuller for longer time.

4. Prevent Prostate Cancer

Soy milk is a rich source of phytoestrogen, a unique plant hormone that can inhibit the production of testosterone in men. Reduced testosterone levels can significantly cut the risk of prostate cancer. Studies have shown that men who eat a soy-rich diet are less likely to develop prostate hypertrophy or prostate cancer.

5. Prevent Postmenopausal Syndromes

During menopause, a woman's natural production of estrogen drops to a minimum. The sudden reduction of estrogen creates a number of health problems for postmenopausal women. Postmenopausal women have higher risks of heart disease, diabetes and obesity. They are also more vulnerable to depression, mood swings, insomnia and other psychological disorders. The phytoestrogen in soy is an effective estrogen replacement. Regular intake of soy is a great way to prevent and alleviate these postmenopausal syndromes.

6. Prevent Osteoporosis

Osteoporosis is another age and hormone related disease. The phytoestrogen in soy can help accelerate calcium absorption by your body and prevent the loss of bone mass. For the maximum benefit, make sure to buy the soy milk that is fortified with extra calcium and vitamin D.

 

âBY FitDay.com

https://www.fitday.com/fitness-articles/nutrition/healthy-eating/6-health-benefits-of-soy-milk.html

Now, young people are even more enthusiastic about healthy living and eating vegetarian, with tofu becoming their new favorite! The generational differences are rapidly disappearing. Regardless anywhere in the world, we've entered an era of all-age inclusivity, and everyone's pursuit of health is becoming unified! When it comes to healthy diet, tofu is definitely everyone's good partner! Tofu is rich in protein, soy isoflavones, lecithin, and soy fiber. Its nutritional value offers multiple benefits, including maintaining muscle mass, suppressing fat accumulation, improving metabolism and gut environment. Its plentiful dietary fiber also helps reduce feelings of hunger, while soy isoflavones can supplement estrogen, helping you avoid weight gain during menopause! In this health-pursuit era, do you need professional tofu artisans to solve any concerns? Ta Ti Hsing is a solution provider with over 60 years of experience, offering professional soybean food machinery and equipment to easily solve your worries! 專業團隊 * English * 繁體版 * HI! 訪客 * 登入 * 註冊 搜尋 * 關於我們 * 產品目錄 * 最新產品 * 訊息公佈 * 黃豆知識 * 聯絡我們 關於我們 * 全球客戶實績 * 企業沿革 * 專利認證 * 專業團隊 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 公司簡介 * 首頁/ * 公司簡介/ * 專業團隊 **●**TA TI HSING 擁有超過 60 年的實踐經驗，為您提供最好的軟體和硬體支持。我們的團隊技術精湛，經驗豐富；我們的專業知識和多元化方法使大地興具有競爭優勢，我們將以您的獨特需求，為您量身定制專屬的黃豆設備。 業務部經反覆與顧客溝通，並充分了解顧客需求，簽訂合約；後續業務人員根據顧客需求，列出完整工作清單，交由設計部規劃執行。 研發部進行生產線配置及繪製，由各組分工進行單機設計，期間並隨時前往現場勘查，繪製2D、3D圖面讓顧客充分了解並確認。 電機部硬體部分進行配盤，同時進行軟體程式規劃與人機編寫。等候製造部機械組立完成後，電機部進入拉線與配線工程，並完成硬體配置後，再由電機部進行軟體程式試車動作。 2D、3D圖面經顧客確認無誤後，始發予製造部各組分工，並執行各製程生產設備製造作業，待設備生產完成後，組立整套生產流水線，並與電機同步進行試車動作與調整。 大地興 擁有60年實踐經驗，交貨安裝載料實作，售後服務完善，提供設備教育訓練及說明手冊。後續若有問題皆可在公司官方LINE進行報修，即時會有服務人員給予回覆，並依照您的產品需求提供最適切的解決方案。 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soy Protein and Cholesterol 2023-05-30 **Soy Protein and Cholesterol** Adding tofu to your stir-fry, soy milk to your morning bowl of oatmeal, or edamame as a snack can be a good move if you're working on improving your cholesterol level. Some studies suggest that soy protein may help, says cardiologist James Beckerman, MD, of Portland, OR. But the evidence isn’t strong, so you'll definitely want to make other changes to your diet to help your cholesterol, too. Eating soy foods may help lower your LDL ("bad") cholesterol by about 3%. That's very little, but when you're trying to take advantage of everything you can do for your cholesterol, it's worth considering. Soy is also a good source of protein, fiber, and heart-healthy omega-3s (though not the same kind that you get in salmon or tuna). Plus, soy is naturally cholesterol-free and low in saturated fat. **What to Eat** The best way to benefit is to swap soy products for foods you usually eat that are high in animal fats. Here’s how: 1. Instead of chicken, try a soy substitute like firm tofu. 2. Instead of ground beef, try soy protein. 3. Instead of a regular hot dog, choose a soy dog. 4. Instead of drinking cow’s milk, experiment with soy milk. 5. make sure it's fortified with calcium and vitamin D, and not too high in sugar. 6. Instead of butter, use soy nut butter. 7. Instead of high-fat cheese, try soy cheese. 8. Instead of processed snack foods, enjoy a cup of edamame. There’s one exception: soy supplements. There’s no proven benefit to adding soy isoflavone supplements to your diet. Stick with whole soy foods instead. Three other things to remember: 1. Soy sauce and soybean oil don’t contain soy protein, even though "soy" is part of their name. 2. Read the label. Make sure the soy products you buy are also low in saturated fat, cholesterol, salt, and added sugar. 3. If you see "soya" on a packaged food, that's another word for soy. **How Much to Eat** If you’re new to eating soy, add it to your diet a little bit at a time. Substitute soy protein for animal protein foods a few times a week. That’s the best way to cut saturated fat and lower your overall risk of disease. A little goes a long way. Your best diet is one that has a variety of foods, like fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds, whole grains, and beans. That’s better than a diet that’s too heavy in soy products. Eating soy in moderation should be fine. But ease into it and see how you do. It's rare, but some people have digestion problems (like stomach pain, loose stools, or diarrhea) when they eat soy. Others are allergic to soy. Also, "some people have concerns that too much soy can have negative hormonal effects, particularly on men,” Beckerman says. There is some controversy about this. Talk with your doctor or a nutritionist about how much soy you should include in your diet. You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Benefits of Fermented Soy 2022-12-15 Benefits of Fermented Soy The humble green soybean, with its resemblance to peas in a pod, may be boiled, soaked, curdled, roasted or fermented to create foods that are staples of vegetarian diets. While tofu, soy milk and edamame are unfermented, tempeh, miso and soy sauce are examples of fermented soy foods. Soy that has undergone fermentation may offer a number of benefits for your health. ## Anti-Allergenic Soy is among the most common food allergens, along with dairy and tree nuts. However, fermenting soy appears to reduce its allergenic properties. A study by researchers at the University of Illinois and published in “Food Engineering and Ingredients” in 2008 found that allergic reactions to soy were cut by 99 percent through fermentation. The process also appears to increase the availability of the amino acids in soy foods. The New Health Favorite of Japanese Youth**】** Tofu is no longer exclusive to the elderly; now Japanese young people are crazy about "Tofu Bar"! This tofu snack, as convenient as an energy bar, provides a full dose of protein with just a tear of the packaging. Thanks to an innovative tofu pressing method, these tofu bars have a firm texture. They are steamed, flavored, and vacuum-packed without the need for baking, making them simple and healthy. These tofu sticks have become incredibly popular in Japanese 7-Elevens, with over 10 million sticks sold annually, becoming the top choice for young people pursuing a healthy lifestyle! If you're also interested in soy product innovations but can't find a way to make them, come to TaTiHsing Tofu Machinery Artisan! You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soy might improve fertility and help with hot flashes. 2022-06-02 Soy appears to be beneficial for fertility, as long as you don’t eat too much. Women undergoing in vitro fertilization who have environmental exposure to BPA are more likely to get pregnant if they also ate soy. That’s likely because soy’s isoflavones help neutralize the BPA’s endocrine-disrupting effects, researchers say. Just don’t go overboard. Consuming over 100mg of soy isoflavones (the equivalent of 6-ounces uncooked tempeh or 16 cups soy milk) daily was linked to reduced ovarian function, found a *Journal of Nutrition* review. But moderate soy consumption didn’t pose a problem. As for soy solving those annoying and disruptive hot flashes that accompany menopause? It might help, but not for everyone. Among women whose bodies produce the soy metabolite equol, those who ate the most soy experienced significantly fewer hot flashes and night sweats compared to those who ate the least, found one *Menopause* study. (Between 20% and 50% of North American and European women produce equol. Some research centers can test for it in a urine sample, but there’s an easier option: Try adding soy to your diet for four to six weeks and see what happens. If it helps, you produce equol. If it doesn’t, you probably don’t, the study authors say.) You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * What Are the Health Benefits of Tofu? 2023-12-20 **What Are the Health Benefits of Tofu?** All For centuries, tofu has been a staple in east and southeast Asian cooking. And in the last 50 years, the soybean-based ingredient has also become a mainstay of vegetarian and vegan eating. Tofu is a versatile ingredient, used in everything from stir fry to smoothies.Incorporating tofu into some of your daily meals and snacks can bring about a number of health benefits. Tofu is a great source of protein, which promotes cardiovascular and bone health and cognitive function, among a plethora of other health impacts. Here's what you should know about tofu, as well as how you can make the most of the adaptable ingredients to support your health. **What Is Tofu?** Tofu, or bean curd, is the product of curdling soy milk and forming the curds into blocks, like cheese. It can have a soft or crunchy texture, depending on how you prepare the ingredient. Additionally, depending on its pressing, tofu is available in silken, soft, firm, extra firm, or super firm varieties. Other types of tofu, per a 2019 Food & Beverages Processing article, include: Fermented: Briny, creamy, and pickled Smoked: Smoked over beech wood and can be eaten raw or with a salad Seasoned: Pre-seasoned with flavors like barbeque or teriyaki According to a study published in 2019 in the Journal of Nutritional Science and Vitaminology, tofu originated in China and quickly became popular throughout several countries in Asia due to it being a cheap source of protein packed with essential nutrients. **Tofu's Nutrition** According to the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), a one-quarter block—or 81 grams—of raw, firm tofu contains the following: *Calories: 117 calories* *Fat: 7.06 grams* *Cholesterol: 0 milligrams* *Sodium: 11.30 milligrams* *Carbohydrates: 2.25 grams* *Fiber: 1.86 grams* *Protein: 14 grams* "Tofu is an excellent source of protein. In fact, it is a rare vegan choice that is a complete source of protein, which means it contains all nine amino acids," Tanya Freirich, RDN, a nutrition counselor and founder of the Lupus Dietitian, told Health. Per the Johns Hopkins Health Library, soy is the component of tofu that provides those essential amino acids.Tofu contains several vitamins and nutrients—including calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, B vitamins, and iron. It is also a good source of manganese, copper, and zinc. Furthermore, the Academy of Nutrition & Dietetics mentions that tofu has antioxidant properties as well. "As a rich source of lean plant-based protein, it's a nutritious choice for most people, particularly those who have dairy and protein food group restrictions, such as vegans," Summer Yule, RDN, told Health. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 大豆對您有好處還是有害？ 2020-06-17 **用大豆代替肉可以保護您的心臟** 早期研究表明，大豆可以幫助降低壞膽固醇水平。但是最近的研究結果表明情況並非如此，美國心臟協會在2008年表示，沒有足夠的證據可以肯定大豆降低了患心髒病的風險。不過，可以肯定地說大豆有一些好處。通常，用大豆等植物性食物代替動物性食物可以降低飽和脂肪的攝入量，並增加纖維的攝入量，這兩者對您的心臟都有幫助。換句話說，將牛排換成豆腐或豆是一種明智的舉動。但是先吃牛排再吃上一碗大豆冰淇淋做甜點可能不會有什麼幫助。 **如果您有甲狀腺問題，應該多注意大豆的攝入量** 洛馬琳達大學對14項研究的評論發現，大豆食品不會影響健康甲狀腺患者的甲狀腺功能。但是，如果您的甲狀腺活動不足，則可能要注意吃多少大豆。大豆食品已被證明會干擾人體對甲狀腺藥物的吸收-但只有在您攝入過量的情況下，2016年*營養學*評論才提出。證據還遠沒有定論，但專家仍建議食用大豆後至少要等四個小時才能服用甲狀腺藥物。 BY MARYGRACE TAYLOR AND KATE ROCKWOOD https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/health/diet-nutrition/a20707020/is-soy-good-or-bad-for-you/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Latest Research: Soy Isoflavones Help You Regain Moisture and Radiance! 2025-02-27 # 【Latest Research: Soy Isoflavones Help You Regain Moisture and Radiance!】 Recent clinical studies confirm that consuming soy products can effectively improve skin health in postmenopausal women. Researchers found that groups consuming soy protein showed significant improvements in wrinkle reduction, pigmentation improvement, and increased skin hydration. ●**Research Findings**: **Smoothing Wrinkles**: Significant reduction in wrinkles, resulting in smoother and more refined skin. **Even Skin Tone**: Reduced pigmentation, leading to a more even, bright, and radiant complexion. **Deep Hydration**: Substantial skin moisture increases, maintaining hydration and being dewy. ●**Soy Isoflavones: The Natural Key to Beauty and Skin Care** Research indicates that these skin care benefits may be closely related to soy isoflavones. Isoflavones are plant compounds widely found in soy products such as soy milk and tofu. They can mimic female hormones, helping to maintain skin elasticity and moisture while age grows. ●**Interested in Soy Food Processing Equipment?** TaTiHsing provides efficient and precise soy food production equipment, making them your trusted professional partner. Smart Money-Saving Tips During the Egg Shortage!****】** Due to the avian flu in the US, egg supplies have become scarce, with prices soaring up to 53% over the past year, which is expected to rise another 20% this year. The egg shortage has pushed prices to record highs and triggered panic buying at supermarkets. Facing this situation, how can we ensure we get enough protein? Don't worry! Eggs aren't the only source of quality protein! ●**Soybeans: Your New Choice for Natural Quality Protein!** Did you know that one cup of soy milk contains the same amount of protein as one egg ? It's a high-quality plant-based protein source! Every 100g of soy milk contains about 36g of protein, with no cholesterol, plus it's rich in dietary fiber. High in nutritional value and excellent cost-effectiveness ! ●**Seize the Opportunity, Master Future Food Trends, Starting with Soybeans!** More and more people are turning to soybeans as their primary protein source. If you're interested in entering the soybean industry but don't know where to start, TaTiHsing offers customized, comprehensive soybean processing equipment to help you turn soybeans into gold! * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆奶與您的健康 2019-01-04 豆奶 - 西方流行的乳製品替代品 - 長期以來一直作為傳統飲料在中國，日本和亞洲其他地區消費。在美國，有些人選擇因乳糖不耐症 問題喝豆奶，而且其他人選擇豆奶作為牛奶的健康選擇。 但大豆的健康益處存在爭議。 與牛奶類似，豆奶是一種常見的食物過敏原，商店購買的品種可能含有糖，填充劑和其他有問題的添加劑。然後是轉基因問題 - 將大豆和玉米放在聚光燈下。那麼牛奶這種“健康”的替代方案是什麼呢？ 脂肪和膽固醇瘦 “獲得牛奶”廣告宣傳了牛奶的健康益處 - 蛋白質，維生素D和鈣含量高，是脂肪的良好來源。從90年代開始，油脂就會隨著油的流行而流行。今天，一些營養學家認為“好”的飽和脂肪，說它們提供能量，讓你在吃完後感到飽足，最終幫助你減肥。 與牛奶不同，豆奶天然含有飽和脂肪，對於那些不相信“好脂肪”炒作的人來說，它是一個很有吸引力的選擇。此外，豆漿不含膽固醇，因為它的植物來源。相反，牛奶每杯含有約20毫克膽固醇。因此，對於高膽固醇或某些類型的心臟問題的人來說，大豆可能是牛奶的可行替代品。 關於豆奶和鈣的真相 使用豆奶作為牛奶替代品的主要缺點之一是其鈣含量低。未加強的豆奶含有大約四分之一的牛奶中的鈣。然而，強化豆奶具有相當量的鈣。但是，一些研究表明，強化鈣不像天然鈣那樣可吸收。因此，不是購買強化豆奶，素食主義者和乳糖不耐症的人應該通過綜合飲食計劃解決鈣問題，包括杏仁，豆類，綠葉蔬菜和沙丁魚（非素食主義者）。 荷爾蒙怎麼樣？ 牛奶和豆漿都含有天然激素。在美國，由於奶牛在整個懷孕期間都會擠奶，因此購買者會消耗牛奶中的雌激素和黃體酮。除此之外，有爭議的使用 rBST或rBGH-兩種類型的合成生長激素與各種類型的癌症和早期性青春期相關 - 而且看起來你正在喝毒素。出於這個原因，選擇有機牛奶是一種更健康的選擇，因為有機實踐禁止使用合成激素。相比之下，豆奶天然含有異黃酮或植物雌激素，一種具有“雌激素活性”的植物衍生化合物。 By Lindsey Goodwin https://www.thespruceeats.com/is-soy-milk-healthy-or-not-765047 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Taiwan Stinky Tofu 2019-04-24 **Stinky tofu** (Chinese: 臭豆腐; pinyin: chòudòufu) is a Chinese form of fermented tofu that has a strong odor. It is usually sold at night markets or roadside stands as a snack, or in lunch bars as a side dish, rather than in restaurants. **History** According to a Chinese legend, a scholar named Wang Zhihe hailing from Huang Shan in Anhui Province invented stinky tofu during the Qing dynasty. After failing the imperial examination, Wang stayed in Beijing and relied on selling tofu to make a living. One day, having a huge quantity of unsold tofu on his hands, he cut the tofu into small cubes and put them into an earthen jar. After several days, he opened up the jar and found out that the tofu had turned greenish and become extremely smelly. Initially perceiving the tofu to taste extremely foul, he found out that it was surprisingly delicious so he decided to start selling it at his store. The stinky tofu that Wang Zhihe invented gained popularity and was later served at the imperial Qing Dynasty palace. The Empress Cixi later named the delicacy "imperial green cubes". **Production** Unlike cheese, stinky tofu fermentation does not have a fixed formula for starter bacteria; wide regional and individual variations exist in manufacturing and preparation. The traditional method of producing stinky tofu is to prepare a brine made from fermented milk, vegetables, and meat; the brine can also include dried shrimp, amaranth greens, mustard greens, bamboo shoots, and Chinese herbs. The brine fermentation can take as long as several months. Modern factories often use quicker methods to mass-produce stinky tofu. Fresh tofu is marinated in prepared brine for only a day or two, especially for fried or boiled cooking purposes. The process only adds odor to the marinated tofu instead of letting it ferment completely. Stinky tofu can be eaten cold, steamed, stewed, or, most commonly, deep-fried, and it is often accompanied by chili sauce or soy sauce. The color varies from the golden, fried Zhejiang-style to the black, typical of Hunan-style stinky tofu. From a distance, the odor of stinky tofu is said to resemble that of rotten garbage or smelly feet.Some people have compared it to the taste of blue cheese,while others have compared it to rotten meat. It is said that the more it smells, the better its flavor. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 2018-08-08 **豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度** **研究人員說，大豆蛋白可能對尚未達到更年期的女性的骨強度產生積極影響。** 一項研究表明，在豆腐和豆奶等食物中攝入大豆蛋白的女性可能能夠抵消更年期對骨骼和代謝健康的負面影響。 對大鼠進行的研究表明，餵食大豆的人有較強的脛骨，這是膝關節和踝關節的重要組成部分。 對於絕經後婦女，骨質疏鬆症，體力活動減少和體重增加是嚴重的健康問題。 研究人員說，大豆蛋白可能對尚未達到更年期的女性的骨強度產生積極影響。 美國密蘇里大學教授Pamela Hinton說：“研究結果表明，所有女性都可以通過添加一些以豆製品為主的全食物 - 豆腐和豆奶來改善骨骼強度。” “我們還認為，以大豆為基礎的飲食可以改善絕經後婦女的代謝功能，”她補充道。 在該研究中，研究小組研究了大豆與玉米基礎日糧對選擇性繁殖的健康水平較低的大鼠的影響。他們進一步分為有卵巢和無卵巢的模仿更年期的影響。 比較大豆飲食對大鼠骨強度和代謝功能的影響，發現餵食大豆的脛骨骨骼比餵食玉米的飲食更強，無論卵巢激素狀態如何。 此外，基於大豆的飲食也改善了有卵巢和沒有卵巢的大鼠的代謝功能 Hinto表示，我們的研究結果表明，女性甚至不需要像在典型的亞洲飲食中那樣吃大豆，但添加一些豆腐或其他大豆，例如素食中的食物，也可助於強化骨骼。 IANS更新時間： 2018年8月8日，下午2:17 IST https://www.news18.com/news/lifestyle/tofu-soy-milk-can-boost-bone-strength-in-women-1837747.html 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

The changes brought about by the epidemic have accelerated the transformation of the digital and automated economy, and our pace has never stopped. In the face of the epidemic, TA TI HSING team responded with the most complete production line services from Sales, R&D, Procurement, Quality control, Electrical engineering to manufacturing, and adopted high-standard operations to achieve perfect production efficiency. TA TI HSING is constantly observing the international trends and trends of the soybean market. For each order, after repeated analysis and communication, it can fully meet the needs of customers, and then design and produce. Related operations for the production line are based on international standards (ISO) as the basic norms, and operate with the best performance. When shipping, there are also the same quality requirements and perfect shipping standards. From reviewing order operations and two-way communication to setting schedules, it is strictly implemented according to the equipment shipping process, and the scheduler determines the best shipping method and selection. Specific collection tools, dispatching collection operations, and determining the size and quantity of vehicles to be transported. We uphold rich experience and enthusiasm to ensure that every customer gets the best service quality. Relying on high-quality shipping guidelines and good reputation, we have achieved excellent results time and time again. With the arrival of the new year, TA TI HSING Machinery is ready for the next day, let us be the most solid partner in your business blueprint. Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * Tati New Plant Opening Ceremony 2018-09-15 **Gathering of dignitaries,****lively atmosphere** **《****Tati New Plant Opening Ceremony****》** Today (15th) Ta Ti Hsing Machinery Co., Ltd. held the opening ceremony for the completion of Daxi plant. Chairman, Cho, Chien-Wang, and the general manager, Cho, Chun-Hung, lead all staff；Invited Mr. Huang Suipeng, deputy director of Taoyuan Economic Development Bureau, fellow members of Rotary Club Taoyuan First District, as well as global customers from Canada, Australia, Japan, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, etc. to participate the event in Taiwan. At the same time, the general managers of well-known domestic tofu and dried tofu manufacturers such as I-MEI, Uni-President, Northwest Foods, Chun Feng Beans Foods and Brothers Farm Foods, the former and present chairmen of the county and city tofu associations and representatives of Daxi tofu industry are invited to attend our ceremony. The scene was lively, and VIPs from the political and business circles gathered. Chairman Cho, Chien-Wang as Assistant Director (AG) of Rotary Club 3502 Taoyuan First District, invited members of Rotary Club Taoyuan District to conduct professional visits through the inauguration of the new plant. A new generation of soybean food equipment was demonstrated. More than 300 people, including supply chain manufacturers and friends in the industry who have cooperated with Ta Ti Hsing for many years, attended the celebration. It fully demonstrated the R&D energy and struggle spirit of the local enterprises in Taoyuan for a long time. After the ribbon-cutting ceremony, guests were invited to hold a Thanksgiving together. Mayor, Cheng Wen-Tsan, was invited to give a speech. Mayor Cheng said Ta Ti Hsing has been cultivating the soybean equipment industry for nearly sixty years in Taoyuan. It has transformed from a traditional bean grinder to a fully automatic soybean food equipment manufacturing after continuous innovation and transformation. Ta Ti Hsing has been passed down for three generations so far, and it can be said to be a representative of the excellent small and medium-sized enterprises in Taoyuan. The city government is planning to set up a dried bean curd museum in Daxi Puding Park in the future requiring the participation of a professional team. At the scene, inviting Chairman, Cho, Chien-Wang, to serve as the consultant of the museum was also proposed, and the atmosphere was lively. In the afternoon, the 2nd Global Soy Products Manufacturers Summit 2018 will be held in succession. This five-yearly event, the general managers or senior executives of well-known food manufacturers such as I-MEI, Standard Foods, Brothers Farm Foods, Chun Feng Beans Foods, etc., attended. Tati specially invited the chief operating officers of YSP and SOEI, the leading brand of Japanese soybean products equipment industry. Together with the former director of Uni-President, a well-known food company in Singapore, he served as the lecturer of the summit. The latest knowledge of the most advanced whole bean and no-cloth shape forming tofu making machine. It triggered a heated discussion among the participants, and it was a worthwhile visit! The chairman, Cho, Chien-Wang, said that the high-quality food factories being engaging in the production of soybean food (soymilk, tofu, dried tofu…) which using Ta Ti Hsing equipment have spread to dozens of cities on five continents so far. Ta Ti Hsing adheres to the original intention of operation, hopes to establish a global soy products exchange platform. Through this platform, global customers can widely share products of different quality and characteristics from various countries, and exchange the latest knowledge of soy products in the industry at the same time, to jointly develop the soy product industry. General manager, Cho, Chun-Hung, also said that in response to the global trend of healthy food, the demand for nutritious and natural soybean food in countries around the world has been growing exponentially in recent years. Ta Ti Hsing, the leader of Taiwan’s soybean food equipment, opened its new Daxi plant today (15th) in order to meet the demand for capacity expansion in the global market. More responsive to the government’s green energy policy, using solar panels to generate electricity. In the future, we will continue to work hard to actively expand internationally and continue to deepen the domestic market. Hope to provide more efficient, more environmentally friendly and safer soybean food equipment to the industry. At the same time, promote the high-quality equipment Made In Taiwan (MIT) to the world. * 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【豆腐棒熱潮！日本年輕人的健康新寵】 2024-10-11 **【豆腐棒熱潮！日本年輕人的健康新寵】** 豆腐不再是年長者的專利，現在日本年輕人瘋迷「豆腐棒」！這款像能量棒一樣方便的豆腐點心，只要撕開包裝就能補充滿滿的蛋白質。由於壓榨豆腐的創新製法，豆腐棒質地硬實，蒸熟加味後真空包裝，無須烤製，簡單又健康。現在這款豆腐棒在日本 7–11 出現超人氣，一年賣出超過1,000萬根，成為年輕人追求健康生活的首選！ 如果你也對豆製品的創新充滿興趣，卻找不到製作的方法，那就來找大地興豆腐機械職人吧！秉持著客戶至上的理念，大地興專注研發黃豆食品設備，為每位客戶提供量身打造的黃豆食品設備解決方案。我們的設備不僅高品質，還能幫助您輕鬆製作美味又健康的黃豆食品，實現“點豆變黃金”的美好目標！ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 豆奶的優點和缺點 2017-10-01 **豆奶的優點和缺點** 如果您對乳製品過敏，乳糖不耐症或者您對乳製品的味道並不感到喜愛，那麼可以選擇豆奶作為替代品。它通常比乳製品具有更長的保質期，並且某些類型的包裝豆奶可以在室溫下儲存數月，這有助於消除由食物變質引起的浪費。豆奶也具有許多營養優勢，儘管某些品種的豆奶中含有糖，這可能會對健康造成危害。 ●優質蛋白質 在你的飲食中加入豆奶作為蛋白質的來源。與大多數基於植物的蛋白質不同 - 黃豆中含有一些，但不是全部，在你的飲食中需要的氨基酸 - 黃豆含有所有九種必需氨基酸。您的身體將這些氨基酸組裝成新的蛋白質，包括免疫系統功能必需的抗體，將組織保持在一起的結構蛋白質，以及幫助您的細胞產生能量的酶。每杯不加糖的普通豆奶提供7克蛋白質。 ●鈣和鐵 喝豆奶也有助於提高你的鈣和鐵。您的身體依賴於飲食中的鈣來維持密集和強壯的骨骼組織。沒有它，你的身體會吸收你的骨骼作為鈣的來源，這會隨著時間的推移降低你的骨密度。一杯不加糖的普通豆奶含鈣量為299毫克，相當於建議的每日鈣攝入量的30％。豆奶中的鐵可以幫助您的紅血管正常運作，幫助確保您身體的所有組織獲得所需的氧氣。每份豆奶提供1.1毫克鐵 - 分別為男性和女性每日攝入鐵攝入量的14％和6％。 ●核黃素和維生素B-12 豆奶還可以幫助您攝入B族複合維生素，並作為核黃素，維生素B-2和維生素B-12的特別豐富的來源。在你的飲食中攝取足夠的維生素B-12有助於你的細胞產生DNA，幫助紅細胞功能，並保持你的神經健康。一份豆奶提供3微克維生素B-12，超過每天所需的2.4微克。豆奶中的核黃素可以幫助你的細胞產生能量，同時也可以保護你的DNA免受損害。喝一杯豆奶可使你的核黃素增加0.51毫克 - 男性每日建議攝入量的39％，女性攝入量的46％。 ▲缺點：將事實與虛構分開 為了避免黃豆，不要迴避在飲食中加入豆奶 - 馬里蘭大學醫學中心指出，黃豆食品對大多數人來說是安全的。例外的是那些患有大豆過敏症的人和最近的乳腺癌患者。由於豆製品（包括豆奶）含有與雌激素結構相似的化學物質，如果您最近患有乳腺癌（有時對雌激素敏感），富含大豆的飲食可能會對健康構成威脅。因此，需要進一步研究以確定大豆在乳腺癌後的安全性。 然而，由於添加的糖含量，某些類型的豆奶確實具有主要的營養缺點。添加糖可以提高你的卡路里而不提供營養價值，並增加你患心血管疾病的風險。選擇不加糖的豆奶，以減少添加的糖 - 它只含有1克天然存在的糖，沒有添加糖。相反，巧克力和香草味豆奶分別含有18和6克的添加糖。 ◎作者： SYLVIE TREMBLAY，MSC https://www.livestrong.com/article/425074-soy-milk-advantages-and-disadvantages/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * How long can commercial soybean milk last? You must do this for self-cooking 2020-12-10 If you have boiled soy milk yourself, you should find that not only the taste is different from the commercially available packaged soy milk, but the shelf life of the commercially available soy milk is also longer. This is not because of what is added to the commercially available soy milk, but depends on the rigorous production process and packaging. ## The key is equipment and sterilization When making homemade soy milk and freshly boiled soy milk in the store, the number of bacteria in the air is high , so it is easy to rot at room temperature. Even if it is refrigerated, it can only be stored for two to three days . The commercially available packaged soy milk is produced on a large scale. In order to ensure food safety, professional machinery and equipment are used, and the integrated production process is strictly controlled from the ultra-high temperature sterilization to the filling mechanism. Therefore, it can be stored in unopened cold storage for the longest. About two weeks . If it is further adopted aseptic packaging, it can be stored at room temperature for 9 months to one year. ## Soy milk and soy milk are made of soybeans, but they are really different The difference comes from the production process. Soymilk is refined based on soy milk through high-pressure homogenization and deodorization. Compared with soy milk, which has a rusty feeling when you drink it, the taste of soy milk is more delicate, like drinking fresh milk. Whether it is soy milk or soy milk, homemade or commercially available, the raw materials are soybeans, and without other additives, the nutrients contained are not much different. However, if the homemade soybean milk does not filter the residue, it can add more dietary fiber and calcium in the soybean residue. Another reminder, homemade soy milk must be boiled to the boil, so as not to cause diarrhea, usually the first time it is boiled, it takes about 20 minutes to boil to complete. Next time you buy soy milk or soy milk, first judge the number of days that can be stored from the production process. Fresh soy milk or refrigerated soy milk must be stored in the refrigerator. Aseptically packaged soy milk should be stored in a cool place without high temperature. After opening, it must be refrigerated. Before drinking, pay attention to whether the packaging is complete and whether the shelf life has expired, so as to avoid drinking soy milk! * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 黃豆相關產品 2020-04-10 大多數雜貨店都出售各種豆製品，包括豆漿，人造肉和嬰兒配方食品。與大多數植物不同，大豆是一種完整的蛋白質，這意味著它包含所有必需氨基酸。這樣可以使大豆代替動物產品，而動物產品通常是全蛋白質的日常飲食來源，並且使大豆成為植物性飲食中受歡迎的補充。 **豆奶** 大豆的研磨，浸泡和過濾會產生一種味道柔和的液體，稱為豆漿。豆漿通常是乳汁的合適替代品。香草和巧克力豆漿通常與無味豆漿一起出售，通常都包裝在無菌容器中。1杯豆漿平均含有104卡路里，6克蛋白質和3.5克脂肪。強化豆漿是鈣，鐵，維生素B-12和維生素D的良好來源。 **豆腐** 大豆凝乳-或豆腐-是用凝結劑凝結大豆製成的。豆腐的味道極少，可以很容易地吸收調味料和調味料。硬豆腐濃密，可用於炒菜或湯中。柔軟的豆腐更可口，可代替冰沙中的酸奶。一份1/2杯的硬豆腐含有88卡路里的熱量，超過10克的蛋白質和5克的脂肪。在雜貨店中，使用豆腐的奶油甜點很常見，堅硬程度不同的普通豆腐也很常見。大多數亞洲市場都出售新鮮的豆腐，豆腐的質地和味道更滑順。 **醬油** 這種具有鹹味的深棕色液體是通過發酵大豆製成的。Shoyu和tamari是醬油的常見品種，通常可在不同的黑暗度下使用。1茶匙的塔馬柳（tamari）具有4卡路里的熱量和335毫克的鈉。蔬菜，肉類和豆腐菜餚通常都需要醬油，但甚至在某些餅乾配方中也可以使用 **大豆油** 根據美國大豆聯合委員會的數據，大多數人造黃油，起酥油和色拉調料都含有大豆油。此外，您在雜貨店看到的大多數“植物油”都是純大豆油。美國心臟協會將大豆油列為維持健康和長壽的安全脂肪。1茶匙大豆油食用時，含有40卡路里的熱量，4.5克的脂肪和少於1克的飽和脂肪。大豆油大多無味，使其在大多數菜餚中均非侵入性。 **其它大豆產品** 大豆是一種用途廣泛的原料，可用於製造世界各地發現的許多產品。一些示例包括攪打過的大豆餡料，大豆奶酪，大豆酸奶，大豆堅果黃油，大豆粗粒，大豆冰淇淋，大豆肉替代品和大豆堅果。浴霸是用大豆製成的薄片，可用於製作捲餅和湯。豆腐乳是壓榨的發酵大豆塊；味增是湯中使用的發酵大豆混合物。納豆是一種粘稠的發酵大豆菜。 By Serena Styles https://healthyeating.sfgate.com/list-soy-products-9058.html 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

* 賀，大地興 榮獲107年度桃園市產業創新研發計畫優良廠商！ * 2019 新型設備展覽會 * 2018年 第二屆 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 大地興 三代傳承 - 桃園在地優良企業代表 * 大地興-新廠落成系列活動 * 大地興 豆腐機械職人~搬家囉! * 2018台北國際食品加工設備暨製藥機械展 大地興-參展訊息 * 大地興-大溪新廠動土，2018年正式啟用 * 本公司整廠豆腐生產線通過SGS歐規CE認證 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 最新消息/ * 【永續創新：大地興JAPAN FOOMA 2024之旅】 2024-06-27 **【永續創新：大地興JAPAN FOOMA 2024之旅】** 台灣黃豆食品設備製造領導者大地興，日前參加了2024年JAPAN FOOMA展會，展現了其對ESG（環境、社會、公司治理）的堅定承諾。參展不僅是為了緊跟國際趨勢，更是大地興實現「食品安全衛生」永續發展目標的重要性。 FOOMA展會以「Breakthrough FOOMA」為主題，聚焦食品技術創新。我們深入考察了從原料處理到最終包裝的全面解決方案，特別關注環境友好、衛生標準和食品安全等關鍵領域。並計劃將這些先進理念融入其黃豆食品設備製造標準之中，以提升產品品質並強化食品安全保障。大地興身為EHEDG會員，並受邀參加了EHEDG（歐洲衛生工程設計集團）舉辦的專題講座，由會長Hein Timmerman主持的講座聚焦食品機械設備的清潔驗證，深入探討了食品安全中的機械設備清潔驗證。這些新知識將直接應用於公司的產品研發和升級，進一步提升生產線的衛生標準，確保產品安全和品質。 通過此次FOOMA展會的參與，大地興不僅加深了對全球食品產業最新趨勢的理解，還與同行、客戶和供應商進行了深入交流，這些寶貴的經驗和見解將成為公司未來發展的重要指引。我們正以實際行動展示如何將食品安全和ESG理念融入企業發展戰略，期望通過不斷創新與改進，在確保食品安全的同時，也能保護環境、社會責任和公司治理方面樹立行業標竿，為台灣黃豆食品製造業的永續發展做出更大貢獻。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? 2020-02-21 **What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types?** Soybeans are a type of legume that can be eaten whole or processed into a variety of forms. **Whole Soy Products** Whole soy products are the least processed and include soybeans and edamame, which are immature (green) soybeans. Soy milk and tofu are also made from whole soybeans . While mature soybeans are rarely eaten whole in the Western diet, edamame is a favorite high-protein appetizer in Asian cuisines. Soy milk is made by soaking and grinding whole soybeans, boiling them in water and then filtering out the solids. It’s commonly used as a milk alternative by people who cannot tolerate dairy or wish to avoid milk. Tofu is made by coagulating soy milk and pressing the curds into blocks. It’s a common source of plant-based protein in vegetarian diets. **Fermented Soy** Fermented soy products are processed using traditional methods and include soy sauce, tempeh, miso and natto . Soy sauce is a liquid condiment made from fermented soy, roasted grains, salt water and a type of mold. Tempeh is a fermented soy cake that originated in Indonesia. Though not as popular as tofu, it’s also commonly eaten as a source of protein in vegetarian diets. Miso is a traditional Japanese seasoning paste made from soybeans, salt and a type of fungus. **Soy-Based Processed Foods** Soy is used to make several processed foods, including vegetarian and vegan meat substitutes, yogurts and cheeses. Soy flours, texturized vegetable protein and soybean oil are used in many packaged foods. **Soy Supplements** Soy protein isolate is a highly processed derivative of soy made by grinding soybeans into flakes and extracting the oil. The flakes are then mixed with alcohol or alkaline water, heated, and the resulting soy concentrate is spray-dried into a powder. Soy protein isolate is available in many protein powders and also added to many processed foods, such as protein bars and shakes. Other soy supplements include soy isoflavones, which are available in capsule form, and soy lecithin, which can be taken in capsules or as a powder. Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【San Francisco Stinky Tofu Contest: The unique charm of traditional Chinese soy products】 2024-10-28 **【San Francisco Stinky Tofu Contest: The unique charm of traditional Chinese soy products】** When you think of stinky tofu, the strong smell and unique taste may come to mind. But on Irving Street in San Francisco, stinky tofu has become the star of the cultural feast. On August 30th and September 27th, 2024, San Francisco Sunset Night Market will host a very challenging Stinky Tofu Eating contest . This is not only a competition of taste buds, but also a celebration of traditional Chinese culture. This contest attracted many local media celebrities, and their participation made the game more entertaining and topical. **The nutritional value of stinky tofu** **Rich in plant-based lactobacilli:**Rich in plant-based lactobacilli , which helps gastrointestinal and digestion. **Rich in Vitamin B12:** Helps prevent Alzheimer's disease . **Unsaturated fat and cholesterol:** a healthy plant-based protein source. Want to know how to make nutritious stinky tofu? Come and find the experts at Ta Ti Hsing Tofu Machinery ! Our equipment can provide the entire process for you, from soaking soybeans, grinding beans, cooking, filtering, curding, pressing, cutting to packaging and sterilization. Even better, we can also teach you the secret of making stinky tofu! Ta Ti Hsing has decades of practical experience and provides you with the best software and hardware support, allowing you to easily produce healthy and delicious stinky tofu, with every bite full of surprising flavors! You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Can You Eat Raw Tofu? 2022-03-18 Tofu is a sponge-like cake made from condensed soy milk. It serves as a popular plant-based protein in many Asian and vegetarian dishes. Many recipes use baked or fried tofu, while others may call for cold, raw tofu that’s often crumbled or cut into cubes. If you’re new to eating tofu, you may wonder whether it’s safe to consume tofu that hasn’t been cooked. This article examines whether raw tofu is safe to eat, as well as any potential risks that may come along with doing so. **Potential benefits of eating raw tofu** The idea of eating raw tofu is slightly misleading, as tofu is an already cooked food. To make tofu, soybeans are soaked, boiled, and made into soy milk. The soy milk is then cooked again, and thickening agents called coagulants are added to help form it into a cake. There are a number of potential benefits of eating tofu straight from its packaging. Tofu is one of the quickest and most inexpensive ways to add plant-based protein to your diet, as it doesn’t require much preparation besides draining excess water. It’s also a good source of nutrients like calcium, iron, magnesium, phosphorus, and manganese. You can add raw tofu to things like smoothies, purées, and blended sauces, or use it as a base in homemade ice cream. Eating tofu raw also minimizes any added oils or fats that may be used during common cooking methods. This, in addition to the fact that tofu is low in calories, may be important for someone wanting to limit their fat or calorie intake. https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/can-you-eat-tofu-raw Back * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790124 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages 2017-10-01 Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages If you're allergic to dairy, lactose intolerant or you just aren't crazy about the taste of dairy milk, reach for soy milk as a comparable alternative. It generally has a longer shelf life than dairy milk, and some types of packaged soy milk can be stored at room temperature for months, which helps eliminate waste caused by food spoilage. Soy milk also has a number of nutritional advantages, although some varieties of soy milk come loaded with sugar, which can pose a health risk. ●High-Quality Protein Include soy milk in your diet as a source of protein. Unlike most plant-based proteins -- which contain some, but not all, of the amino acids you need in your diet -- soy contains all nine essential amino acids. Your body assembles these amino acids into new proteins, including antibodies essential for immune system function, structural proteins that hold your tissues together, and enzymes that help your cells produce energy. Each cup of unsweetened, plain soy milk provides 7 grams of protein. ●Calcium and Iron Drinking soy milk also helps boost your calcium and iron. Your body relies on the calcium from your diet to maintain dense and strong bone tissue. Without it, your body draws on your bones as a source of calcium, which reduces your bone density over time. A cup of unsweetened plain soy milk boasts a calcium content of 299 milligrams, which contributes 30 percent toward your recommended daily calcium intake. The iron in soy milk helps your red blood vessels function properly, helping ensure that all the tissues throughout your body get the oxygen they need. Each serving of soy milk provides 1.1 milligrams of iron -- 14 and 6 percent of the daily iron intakes recommended for men and women, respectively. ●Riboflavin and Vitamin B-12 Soy milk also helps you consume B-complex vitamins, and serves as an especially rich source of riboflavin, or vitamin B-2, and vitamin B-12. Getting enough vitamin B-12 in your diet helps your cells produce DNA, aids in red blood cell function and also keeps your nerves healthy. A serving of soy milk provides 3 micrograms of vitamin B-12, more than the 2.4 micrograms you need each day. The riboflavin in soy milk helps your cells produce energy, and it also shields your DNA from damage. Drinking a cup of soy milk boosts your riboflavin by 0.51 milligrams -- 39 percent of the recommended daily intake for men and 46 percent for women. ▲Disadvantages: Separate Fact from Fiction Don't shy away from including soy milk in your diet out of a fear of soy -- the University of Maryland Medical Center notes that soy foods are safe for most people. The exceptions are those who have soy allergies and recent breast cancer patients. Because soy products, including soy milk, contain chemicals similar in structure to estrogen, a diet rich in soy might pose a health risk if you've recently had breast cancer, which is sometimes sensitive to estrogen. As a result, further research is needed to determine soy's safety after breast cancer. However, some types of soy milk do have a major nutritional disadvantage because of their added sugar content. Added sugars boost your calories without offering nutritional value, and increase your risk of cardiovascular disease. Select unsweetened soy milk to minimize added sugar -- it contains just 1 gram of naturally occurring sugars and no added sugar. Chocolate and vanilla flavored soy milks, in contrast, contain 18 and 6 grams of added sugar per serving, respectively. ◎BY SYLVIE TREMBLAY, MSC https://www.livestrong.com/article/425074-soy-milk-advantages-and-disadvantages/ Back * Member Area * Inquiry * Contact Us * Download * Links * Career * FAQ * Privacy Policy * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw You are the 790124 visitor * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * Address：No.39, Ln. 37, Sec. 2, Renhe Rd., Daxi Dist., Taoyuan City 335, Taiwan (R.O.C.) * TEL：+886-3-390-0862 * FAX：+886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw * Design by GTUT * Soybean - Soaking / Washing * Soybean - Grinder * Soymilk - Cooking * Soymilk - Filtering * Automatic Coagulating Machine * Tofu - Pressing * Tofu - Cutting * Auto Production Line * Pasteurizing Machines * Accessory Equipments * New Products

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Drinking Soy Milk for Weight Loss: Does It Work? 2022-11-23 **Drinking Soy Milk for Weight Loss: Does It Work?** Soy milk is the most popular non-dairy milk alternative. Made from nutritiously dense soy beans, soy milk is naturally high in proteins, essential fatty acids and a variety of vitamins and minerals. Drinking soy instead of regular cow's milk provides your body with balanced nutrition without taking in the extra saturated fat and cholesterol associated with whole dairy. Soy milk is a drink of choice if you have high blood pressure, high cholesterol or other propensities for heart diseases. It is also a wonderful weight loss aid. Including soy milk as a part of your healthy diet plan can help suppress your appetite and promote more efficient metabolism. **Calories and Carbohydrates in Soy Milk** The most apparent advantage of soy milk over cow's milk in terms of weight loss is its reduced calorie and sugar content. One average cup of whole soy milk contains about 80 calories, which is even lower than most skim milk. Soy milk also has more quality carbohydrates than dairy milk. Dairy is high in lactose which accounts for the 12 grams of sugar in each serving. Soy contains only half of this amount. The rest of the soy carbohydrates are dietary fiber. One cup of soy milk provides 3 grams of fiber which meets 12% of your daily fiber need. Increasing your fiber intake can help maintain the feeling of fullness and speed up the transit of food through your digestive tract. If you drink skim milk for weight loss, you can avoid the watery taste and get the added benefits of fiber by switching to unsweetened soy milk. **Soy Can Help Reduce Body Fat** Unlike milk fat which is highly saturated and prone to form deposits, soy fat is good for you. The monounsaturated fat in soy milk not only prevents increase of blood fat, it also inhibits your intestinal fat and cholesterol absorption. The phytosterol in soy also has this fat blocking function. In essence, having soy milk in your diet lowers your actual exposure to dietary fat. You can drink full fat soy milk or eat snacks or desserts made with soy milk without feeling guilty. Soy milk is also loaded with fat-burning vitamins. One cup of soy milk contains 30% of the recommended daily intake (RDI) of riboflavin and 50% RDI of vitamin B12. These two vitamins are both involved in energy production and are especially needed for fatty acid metabolism. Higher intake of these nutrients can help you burn off fat more efficiently which can be a tremendous help towards weight loss. **Build Lean Muscles With Soy Milk** Soy milk can deliver as much protein as dairy milk. Each cup of soy milk contains 7 grams of protein composed of all varieties of essential amino acids. In fact, soy protein is considered as one of the best sources of complete protein which provides all-around nutrition for healthy muscles, tissues and all your functional systems. Studies have shown that regular intake of soy products in addition to routine exercise can lead to reduced body fat and higher percentage of lean muscles. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 當你每天吃大豆時你的身體會發生什麼? 2024-01-19 **當你每天吃大豆時你的身體會發生什麼?** 但是當你每天吃大豆食品時到底會發生什麼事呢？讓我們深入研究每天吃大豆對身體有何影響。 **您可能會獲得優質蛋白質** 從建構和修復肌肉、皮膚、組織、頭髮和指甲到支持和建構荷爾蒙和酶，蛋白質是體內每個細胞的重要組成部分。如果您遵循植物性飲食模式，您就不想錯過大豆，主要是豆腐和毛豆等傳統大豆食品。兩者都提供優質蛋白質，根據美國農業部的數據，每 1 杯（155 克）去殼毛豆含有 18.4 克蛋白質，每 1/2 杯生硬豆腐含有 21.8 克蛋白質。 一般來說，成年人每天每公斤體重需要約0.8克蛋白質。換句話說，如果您的體重為 60 公斤（132 磅），那麼您只需吃 1 杯帶殼毛豆和 1/2 杯老豆腐就幾乎可以滿足您每日的蛋白質需求。 **您可能會降低心臟病的風險** 每天吃傳統大豆食品的另一個好處是可以降低心臟病的風險。最近發表在《循環》雜誌上的一項研究發現，每周至少吃一份豆腐的人比每月吃少於一份豆腐的人患心臟病的風險低 18%。事實上，大豆是美國食品藥物管理局授權的唯一一種具有健康主張的植物性蛋白質，即含有大豆蛋白的低飽和脂肪飲食可以降低冠狀動脈心臟病的風險。 **您可能會降低膽固醇水平** 吃大豆食品還可以降低低密度脂蛋白（「壞」）膽固醇水平。《營養雜誌》 2019 年發表的一篇評論發現，每天攝取25 克大豆蛋白（略多於半杯生豆腐），連續六週，與不吃大豆蛋白的人相比，低密度脂蛋白膽固醇降低了3% 至4%任何。 儘管如此，關於食用大豆及其降低膽固醇水平的潛力的爭論仍在繼續。一些研究並未發現大豆可以顯著降低膽固醇。儘管如此，您可能仍然想在飲食中加入這些低飽和脂肪的大豆食品。例如，每杯毛豆僅含有約 1 克飽和脂肪，每 1/2 杯老豆腐含有 1.5 克，使其成為飽和脂肪含量通常較高的動物蛋白的完美替代品。 原文網址： https://www.eatingwell.com/article/7969228/is-soy-bad-for-you/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【Plant-based protein, the new era of health!】 2023-08-25 **【Plant-based protein, the new era of health!】** In recent years, global attention towards environmental protection and healthy diet has increased. Many places around the world are advocating for less meat for a better environment. In this trend, plant-based protein has become an increasingly popular option. Tofu as an excellent vegetarian alternative, is rich in vegan protein, minerals, and fiber, making it the best choice for vegetarians and those who want to reduce meat intake, or those pursuing a healthy diet. Upholding the machinery craftsmanship, Ta Ti Hsing has been specializing in soybean food production equipment for over 60 years. In this era where plant-based protein has become a popular choice, we continue to provide high-quality automatic equipment for the soybean industry, allowing more people to enjoy healthy and high-quality soy goods. Ta Ti Hsing provides tofu through full automatic equipment, making tofu no longer difficult! From soaking, washing, grinding, cooking, filtering, coagulating, pressing, cutting, and pasteurizing, each process has corresponding specialized equipment for the entire production line. We provide manufacture line planning and technical support to make the capacity more efficient and stable, while ensuring food safety and hygiene. As a new favorite plant-based protein, compared to other foods, soybean food not only has the function of preventing the risk from heart disease, but also provides rich plant-based protein, cholesterol-free, unsaturated fatty acids, vitamin B, fiber, iron, calcium, and zinc, within various nutritional needs and helping to maintain good condition. It has become a top choice for health-conscious. Tofu is not only a delicious food, but also drives the new wave of healthy diet. Ta Ti Hsing's full-automatic production equipment has reliable quality and excellent performance. We hope to bring an innovative experience in tofu production to you. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 永續X黃豆：健康與環保雙贏！ 2025-03-20 **【永續X黃豆：健康與環保雙贏！】** 永續農業 (Sustainable Agriculture) 是當前先進國家重要的農業政策，為了延續生產糧食，並達到友善環境的一種決策。美國在永續農業方面採取了多項措施，旨在提高農業生產力的同時，減少對環境的負面影響。以下是美國推動永續農業的主要策略： 美國黃豆**的永續策略：** ● **友善土地管理** 美國農場透過作物輪作、限制灌溉用水，以及利用衛星技術精準施肥，不僅保護土壤健康，還能降低對環境的影響。 ● **維護生物多樣性** 黃豆不得種植於生態敏感區，如草場、濕地與保護區，以防止農藥與肥料影響周圍生態。 ● **保障農民安全** 美國農業部嚴格規範農藥使用，以降低農民暴露於有害物質的風險，確保勞工健康與福祉。 **黃豆食品：健康&環保一次Get！** 黃豆富含優質植物蛋白、大豆異黃酮、不飽和脂肪酸與膳食纖維，有助於降血脂、維持骨骼健康。每天一杯豆漿或一塊豆腐，讓健康更無負擔！ **想投入黃豆食品市場？交給專業的！** 健康飲食當道，想開展豆腐、豆漿事業卻煩惱設備？大地興擁有60多年專業經驗，提供高效黃豆食品機械，讓生產更簡單！立即聯繫我們，共創黃豆事業美好未來！ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 2018-10-08 **不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們** 作者：LIV WAN Tofu Puffs（豆腐泡） 您通常會在中國超市的冷藏區看到玻璃紙袋中的這些金黃色方塊。這些小立方體有許多不同的名稱，包括Bean Kow，Bean Curd Puffs或Tofu Puffs。豆腐泡芙的美感是它們具有超強的吸水性。因此，豆腐泡芙通常用燉菜，肉湯和湯煮熟。我的祖母在冬天為火鍋做豆腐泡芙。這種豆腐泡芙是我家最受歡迎的火鍋配料之一。填餡豆腐泡芙是豬肉或牛肉碎混合切碎的蔥，demerara糖，淡醬油，黑胡椒粉和芝麻油。我的祖母會拿一個豆腐泡芙，在裡面做一個小洞，把餡料塞進裡面，用火鍋或雞湯做飯。 儲存：保持冷藏數天 豆腐乳（豆腐乳） 腐乳的名稱有很多，包括發酵豆腐，lufu，rufu，sufu，豆腐奶酪或大豆奶酪。這種保存的豆腐在中國菜中也被稱為“中國奶酪”。這種保存的豆腐是豆腐切成方塊並在米酒中發酵。它通常在中國超市的玻璃罐或罐中出售。有不同種類的腐乳，包括發酵辣椒豆腐，紅腐乳，白腐豆腐，臭豆腐等。在中國菜中也有許多不同的方法可以使用腐乳。一些中國人喜歡用這種腐乳作為饅頭塗抹。饅頭是一種中國饅頭/麵包。你也可以用醃製的豆腐炒蔬菜或者用作醃雞肉（你可以看看我的食譜“中式炸雞翅”，這是醃製雞翅和腐乳。） 儲存：保持冷藏數月 干豆腐板和棒（腐竹） 這種成分也被稱為豆腐皮，豆腐皮或豆腐長袍。豆腐棒是由煮沸的豆奶表面形成的“皮膚”製成的。烹飪前必須補充干豆腐棒。補充豆腐棒的最佳方法是將它們浸泡在冷水中並讓它過夜（至少8小時）。然後排乾水並將其切割成您喜歡的尺寸，或遵循配方說明並按照配方進行準備。豆腐棒有一種肉質，所以在東方，許多素食餐館喜歡用這種成分代替肉來為顧客服務。豆腐棒非常健康，是蛋白質的良好來源。您可以在炒菜，燉菜，包裝點心，油炸，燉菜等中使用豆腐棒。它是中國菜中非常受歡迎的成分。我喜歡用豆腐棒打結並放入燉菜中。豆腐結看起來非常可愛，豆腐棒吸收所有的肉湯，所以它們的味道非常好，但也非常健康。 儲存：無限期保存在陰涼處。 五香豆腐（五香豆干） 有人稱之為五香豆腐或壓榨豆腐。這種五香豆腐用五香粉和其他成分在水中壓榨和燉煮。質地非常堅硬，你可以切片，炒，做沙拉，甚至加入湯。它足夠牢固，可以在任何類型的盤子裡保持它的形狀。 儲存：保持冷藏約1週，但如果打開包裝，請盡快使用。 豆腐食譜參考如下： 中式炸雞翅 - 美味脆皮炸雞翅。雞翅是醃製豆腐和其他成分，使這種雞翅更加美味和特別。 豆皮壽司 - 用醃製的豆腐片包裹米醋飯 調味豆腐 - 用豆腐片和土豆泥製成的豆腐 素食火腿 - 用豆腐片製作的開胃卷辣豆腐炒，用壓榨豆腐製成 素食鄉村燉菜 - 豆腐在這道豐盛的菜餚中浸泡燉煮 素食八寶 - 用壓榨豆腐，蔬菜和熱豆醬製成的辛辣菜餚 由 Liv Wan 提供 出處 https://www.thespruceeats.com/bean-curds-and-how-to-use-them-4061237 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

To develop the automated food equipment better, we specifically visited the Anuga FoodTec, a food technology machinery exhibition in Cologne, Germany for on-site investigation. Anuga FoodTec is an information and business platform for the international food and beverage automation equipment industry, providing professional knowledge and technology in various fields such as optimizing production lines, the technology of automation, crafts, filling, and packing. Even the food safety, digitization, and internal logistics. This expedition has provided valuable resources for TaTiHsing, enabling us to realize the newest technological trends and market developments. This will contribute to the production technology of soybean equipment. In the meantime, it can make the customers using TaTiHsing equipment grow with us and strengthen their competitiveness in the market as well. Through this investigation, we gained the latest information in food technology and valuable experience. We also formulated clearer future development strategies. TaTiHsing will continue to demand of ourselves, striving to become professionals in the field of soybean food machinery innovation. Providing customers with higher quality products and services, also actively contributing to society and the environment.
