* 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 大豆和毛豆之間的差異 2022-08-10 **大豆和毛豆之間的差異** 毛豆是一種在未成熟且仍呈嫩綠色時收穫的大豆。毛豆通常作為新鮮蒸過的蔬菜食用，而大豆則待其成熟和硬化。大豆和毛豆雖然同屬一科，但在用途和營養方面存在一定差異。 **毛豆和大豆的區別** 大豆是豆科植物的一員，傳統上在亞洲食用，現在在西方國家也很受歡迎。黃豆看起來像綠豆，只是它們更扁平，綠色更暗，豆莢上有細毛。 毛豆和大豆之間的區別在於，毛豆在年輕時收穫並新鮮供應，通常在仍包裹在豆莢中的情況下進行蒸煮。你吃它們去殼。嫩嫩的綠色軟種子是一種營養豐富的小吃或主要蔬菜。 待成熟的大豆會變成堅硬的干豆，通常是黃色的，但也可以是黑色或棕色。成熟的大豆不能生吃，必須煮熟或發酵。 大豆主要用於許多加工食品中的油，例如沙拉醬、人造黃油和烘焙食品。它們還用於製作豆製品，如豆腐、豆粉、醬油、味噌、豆漿和豆堡。整粒大豆也可以浸泡和乾烤作為大豆堅果零食，或者煮熟後添加到湯、醬汁和燉菜中。 **營養成分：毛豆與大豆** 大豆提供許多健康益處——最重要的是，它是蛋白質的完整來源。這意味著大豆含有生產身體正常運作所需的蛋白質所需的所有必需氨基酸。這使得毛豆和大豆成為許多素食者和純素食者飲食的基石，以滿足他們的蛋白質需求。 大豆和毛豆含有重要的 **omega-3 脂肪**，但飽和脂肪含量低且不含膽固醇。每100克毛豆含有9克總脂肪；未加工的成熟大豆有 19.9 克。 在**總脂肪含量**中，100 克毛豆含有 1,981 毫克單不飽和脂肪和 5,064 毫克健康多不飽和脂肪；整個生大豆分別含有 4,404 和 11,255 毫克。 Author By Gord Kerr https://www.livestrong.com/article/447704-differences-between-soy-beans-edemame/ 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

自立晚報-提升豆製品價值，大地興舉辦2013全球豆製品高峰會 * English * 繁體版 * HI! 訪客 * 登入 * 註冊 搜尋 * 關於我們 * 產品目錄 * 最新產品 * 訊息公佈 * 黃豆知識 * 聯絡我們 訊息公佈 * 大地興優質企業設廠 拉抬大溪豆干產業 * 2018大溪廠落成 採用太陽能發電 (民眾日報) * 大地興(感謝影片) - 感謝全球客戶與朋友蒞臨指導 * 2013年 全球豆製品廠商高峰會 * 自立晚報-提升豆製品價值，大地興舉辦2013全球豆製品高峰會 * 民眾日報-全球豆製品廠商高峰會逾 50 廠商齊聚桃園 * 新桃新聞-大地興，優質豆製品的幕後"磨手" * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 訊息公佈 * 首頁/ * 訊息公佈/ * 新聞集錦/ * 自立晚報-提升豆製品價值，大地興舉辦2013全球豆製品高峰會 2013-07-09 **2013年06月28日** **提升豆製品價值，大地興辦2013****全球豆製品高峰會** | | | --- | 【記者楊淑媛桃園報導】「首屆全球豆製品廠商高峰會」 6月27日於桃園舉行，**吸引海內、外五十餘個國家的豆製品廠商**熱絡參加，共同探討如何提供人類最優質的豆類製品，加強人類養生健康；桃園縣議員、桃園青創會理事長林政賢並蒞會參加，**與會廠商****們**亦對主辦單位大地興研發設計的各種豆製品機器，提升豆製品的產值與價值，**肯定是全球優質豆製品的幕後****“磨手”**。 主辦單位大地興食品機器廠負責人卓建旺說，今年是大地興**成立五十三年**，感恩父親卓聰前在艱困的創業初期，以專業、務實的精神，帶領大地興研發設計食品機器團隊，將大地興的食品機器行銷到全球五十多個國家，如今大地興由兒子卓駿宏接棒，三代共同經營大地興，有父親豐富的智慧與經驗指導，兒子卓駿宏運用E化科技，深信大地興將更加茁壯。 大地興是研發設計各種豆製品機器的公司，為何舉辦「2013全球豆製品廠商高峰會」？卓建旺說，其實這得感謝兒子卓駿宏的發想，因為兒子卓駿宏認為，利用每年六月底是臺灣舉辦食品加工機器展的期間，邀請**長年來使用大地興食品機器的海、外廠商齊聚一堂**，各自以站在第一線的使用經驗、心得，**提供同業如何生產更好的豆類製品交流同時，亦可給上游的食品機器廠更多建議、進而於研發設計上更加精進**。 卓建旺認為，**大地興研發設計的食品機器，行銷全球五十多個國家**，為臺灣桃園廣開高知名度，而「首屆全球豆製品廠商高峰會」在桃園舉辦，更可讓來自海內外的參加人士，有機會遊覽桃園，認識桃園；27日上午該活動於桃園市尊爵大飯店舉辦的全球豆製品廠商高峰會中，邀請食品專家黃三龍演講「明日之星─大豆的魅力」並討論豆渣再利用，下午則前往位於中壢市的江記豆腐文化館參觀。 卓建旺進一步指出，全世界50億人口，每天至少有10億人在吃豆腐，大地興研發設計的各類豆製品食品機器，國內**統一、義美、大漢、西北、春豐、榮洲、明記等知名食品公司，皆採用該公司設備**。 圖說：業界尊稱豆製品機器權威的大地興公司，三代經營者卓聰前(左三)、卓建旺(左二)、卓駿宏(右二)與食品專家黃三龍(右三)桃園縣議員、桃園青創會理事長林政賢(左一)、國巨洋傘董事長李銘智(右一)。 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? 2020-06-17 **Eating soy in place of meat will probably protect your heart.** Early research suggested that soy could help lower levels of bad cholesterol. But more recent findings have shown that might not be the case, and in 2008, the American Heart Association said that there wasn’t enough evidence to say for sure that soy lowered the risk of heart disease. Still, it’s safe to assume that soy has some benefits going for it. In general, replacing animal foods with plant foods like soy lowers saturated fat intake and ups fiber intake, both of which are help your heart. In other words, swapping that steak out for tofu or tempeh is a heart-smart move. But having steak followed by a bowl of soy ice cream for dessert probably won’t be as helpful. **You should pay more attention to your soy intake if you have thyroid issues.** Soy foods don’t affect thyroid function in people with healthy thyroids, found a Loma Linda University review of 14 studies. But if you have an underactive thyroid, you might want to watch how much soy you eat. Soy foods have been shown to interfere with the body’s absorption of thyroid medication — but only if you overdo it, suggests a 2016 *Nutrients* review. The evidence is still far from conclusive, but experts still advise to wait at least four hours after consuming soy to take your thyroid medicine. Shop Front type soy milk machine * Foodtech & Pharmatech Taipei 2018 Exhibition Information * Dasi New Plant Will Opening in 2018. * Our Automatic Series Machinery are SGS CE Approved * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # News * Home/ * News/ * Latest Updates/ * 【TA TI HSING won the 20th National Brand Yushan Award!】 2023-10-26 **【****TA TI HSING won the 20th National Brand Yushan Award!****】** The list of winners of the 20th “National Brand Yushan Award” was presented. The judging panel not only examined international market trends and competitive advantages, but also assessed the vision and direction. In the end, TA TI HSING stood out with its excellent overall operational performance, R&D capability, quality policy, marketing services and other comprehensive performance. We are honored to receive the "Outstanding Enterprise Award" from the judges! Vice President William Lai was on hand to present the trophies in the Outstanding Enterprise Award, recognizing TA TI HSING's quality image of "Quality, Taste, and Brand". Vice President Lai said he hoped that the government would act as a back-up for the enterprises, so that the value of Taiwan's brands would continue to rise. TA TI HSING has been in the soybean food machinery business since 1961, more than 60 years now, the longest history of automated soy food equipment manufacturing in Taiwan. Thus, TA TI HSING has taken on the responsibility of working with the government to make Made in Taiwan well-known, so that Made in Taiwan can be recognized internationally and let Taiwan advance towards the world. # Outstanding Enterprise, Comprehensive Performance, International Stage! You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Good News for Sensitive Stomachs: Low-FODMAP Soy Foods 2024-11-25 **Good News for Sensitive Stomachs: Low-FODMAP Soy Foods** There are many soy-based foods that are suitable for the low FODMAP (Fermentable Oligo-, Di-, Monosaccharides And Polyols) diet such as firm tofu, soy cheese, plain tempeh, edamame, soybean oil, soy sauce, miso, and some soymilk.10 Food processing, fermentation, and maturity of the plant can impact the FODMAP content of soyfoods. For low and high FODMAP soyfoods examples, see the Table. Table : Low and High FODMAP Soy-based Foods Because FODMAPs are water-soluble carbohydrates, draining off the liquid, as is done with firm tofu, reduces the FODMAP content compared to silken tofu. The liquid contains the water-soluble oligosaccharides from the soybeans. The fermentation process utilized to make tempeh reduces its FODMAP content. Natto, a fermented soybean dish, has yet to be tested for FODMAPs and soy yogurt has been tested as high FODMAP. Products that utilize soy protein versus the whole soybean will be lower in FODMAP carbohydrates as well. For example, soymilk made with the whole soybean is high FODMAP versus soymilk made with isolated soy protein which is low FODMAP. * 不同種類的黃豆製品 如何使用它們 * 豆腐，豆奶可以提高女性的骨骼強度 * 大豆蛋白中的氨基酸 * 豆腐健康嗎？ * 豆腐營養知識 * 黃豆 魅力 * 豆奶的健康益處 * 豆奶的優點和缺點 * 黃豆的健康益處 * 黃豆的營養成分 * RSS * 產品 * 訊息 訂閱電子報 訂閱 # 黃豆知識 * 首頁/ * 黃豆知識/ * 黃豆的健康益處 2017-03-01 **黃豆的健康益處** 像大多數全食物一樣，黃豆具有許多有益健康的功效。 ### 預防乳腺癌和前列腺癌 癌症是現代社會死亡的主要原因之一。 吃豆製品已與乳腺組織增加婦女，假設增加患乳腺癌的風險。 然而，大多數的觀察性研究表明，食用豆製品可降低乳腺癌。 研究還表明在男性（預防前列腺癌的保護作用）。 許多黃豆成分可能是潛在的預防癌症的原因。這些包括異黃酮，凝集素，和露那辛。 暴露於在生命早期異黃酮可以是抗乳腺癌以後的生活中。 請記住，關於該主題的所有人類研究都是所謂的觀察性研究。它們表明黃豆消費與癌症之間存在關聯，但不能證明因果關係。 > 一句話：黃豆含有許多可能有助於預防乳腺癌和前列腺癌的植物化合物。 ### 緩解更年期症狀 更年期是女性月經停止時的生命期。 它通常與令人不快的症狀相關，例如出汗，潮熱和情緒波動，這些都是由雌激素水平降低引起的。 有趣的是，亞洲女性，尤其是日本女性，與西方女性相比，更不可能出現與更年期相關的症狀。 飲食習慣，例如亞洲黃豆食品消費量的增加，可以解釋這種差異。 研究表明，黃豆植物雌激素中發現的異黃酮，可以減輕絕經的症狀。 黃豆產品不會以這種方式影響所有女性。黃豆在所謂的雌馬酚生產者中似乎是有效的，這些女性擁有一種能夠將異黃酮轉化為雌馬酚的腸道細菌。 Equol被認為是黃豆消費的許多有益健康影響的原因。 每天攝入135毫克異黃酮一周，相當於每天68克黃豆，僅在雌馬酚生產者中減少更年期症狀。 傳統上，激素療法已被用作更年期症狀的治療。今天，異黃酮補充劑被廣泛用作替代療法。 > 一句話：吃黃豆可能有助於緩解更年期的症狀。 ### 骨骼健康 骨質疏鬆症的特徵是骨密度降低和骨折風險增加，特別是在老年婦女中。 食用豆製品可降低骨質疏鬆症已經經歷更年期。 > 一句話：黃豆可能會減少絕經後婦女患骨質疏鬆症的風險。 ◎來自Authority Nutrition的專家提供的循證營養文章。 https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/foods/soybeans 回上一頁 * 會員中心 * 詢價管理 * 聯絡我們 * 下載專區 * 網站連結 * 人才招募 * 常見問題 * 隱私權政策 * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; 您是本站第 790124 位訪客 * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品 * Design by GTUT * B2BManufactures * 地址: 桃園市大溪區仁和路二段37巷39號 * 電話: +886-3-390-0862 * 傳真: +886-3-390-0737 * info@tati.com.tw;marketing@tati.com.tw; * Design by GTUT * 黃豆 - 浸泡&清洗 * 黃豆 - 磨碎 * 豆奶 - 煮漿 * 豆奶 - 過濾 * 豆腐 - 凝固 * 豆腐 - 壓水 * 豆腐 - 切割 * 全自動生產線 * 殺菌機系列 * 週邊機械 * 最新產品

You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * Soy beans, black beans and other legumes rank first, which are excellent sources of protein! 2021-06-08 In order to allow domestic soybeans to enter the daily table of the people and become a good ingredient for three meals, the Agriculture and Food Administration of the Executive Yuan's Agriculture Committee recently organized the "Domestic Soybean Network Recipe Solicitation Campaign." At the press conference on the announcement of the results of the event, nutritionist Zhang Yiyao, founder of Parent-child Foods, said: "Just as the Ministry of Health and Welfare recommends the priority order of protein intake "beans, fish, eggs, and meat", soy beans, black beans and other legumes are ranked first and are excellent sources of protein!" **Increase muscle fat, prevent sarcopenia** Protein is the key to muscle composition. According to height, weight and plan, there are different protein intake recommendations. Generally speaking, each person needs about 6 to 10 servings of protein food per day (protein food = beans, fish, eggs, meat). For those who exercise or want to lose weight, protein supplementation plus enough exercise can increase muscle mass and reduce fat and avoid sarcopenia. Compared with meat ingredients that are higher in calories, cholesterol, and saturated fat, soybeans are called "meats in vegetables". They are rich in soy protein, low in calories, full of satiety, no cholesterol, low in saturated fat, and dietary fiber. Promote intestinal peristalsis and improve constipation. According to research, the saponin and soy isoflavones contained in soybeans can also inhibit the absorption of carbohydrates and lipids. It is recommended to supplement nutrition immediately after exercise: 40% protein + 60% carbohydrates help stabilize blood sugar and repair muscle tissue, so you can eat sugar-free soy milk plus a banana after exercise. However, the dietitian reminds that if you consume too much protein and do not exercise, it is easy to cause excess calories! You must do this for self-cooking * High-quality soy vegetable protein reduced sugar healthier * Is Soy Good or Bad for You? * List of Soy Products * What Is Soy and What Are the Different Types? * Soy milk ? * All About Soy Milk * Taiwan Stinky Tofu * Soy Milk and Your Health * How is boxed tofu produced in the market ? * Different kind of bean curds and how to use them * Tofu, Soy Milk Can Boost Bone Strength in Women * Amino Acids in Soy Protein * Is Tofu Healthy? * Tofu Nutrition Information * Soy Food Features * Health Benefits of Soy Milk * Soy Milk Advantages and Disadvantages * Health Benefits of Soybeans * Soybeans Nutrition Facts * RSS * Product * Message Subscribe Newsletters Send # Knowledge * Home/ * Knowledge/ * What Happens to Your Body When You Eat Soy Every Day? 2024-01-19 **What Happens to Your Body When You Eat Soy Every Day?** Soy foods like tofu, tempeh and miso are important ingredients in many traditional Asian diets. But although the U.S. is one of the major producers of soybeans in the world, with soybeans being the second-largest crop grown in the country, many U.S. adults don't consume lots of soy products. Intake of soy foods on a typical Western diet may be relatively low, but does still include soy in various forms, from cooking oil to condiments such as soy sauce and tamari to soybeans in a pod (edamame), to dairy and protein alternatives such as soymilk, soy flour, soy protein isolate and soy protein lecithin and more. But what exactly happens when you eat soy foods every day? Let's take a deep dive into the research to see how eating soy every day can affect the body. **You May Get High-Quality Protein** From building and repairing muscles, skin, tissue, hair and nails to supporting and building hormones and enzymes, protein is an essential part of every cell in the body. If you follow a plant-based eating pattern, you do not want to miss out on soy, mainly traditional soy foods like tofu and edamame. Both offer high-quality protein, with 18.4 grams of protein per 1-cup (155 grams) serving for shelled edamame and 21.8 grams for every 1/2 cup of raw firm tofu, per the USDA. Generally speaking, adults need around 0.8 grams daily protein per kilogram of body weight. In other words, if you weigh 60 kilograms (132 pounds), you will almost meet of your daily protein requirement just by eating 1 cup of shelled edamame and 1/2 cup of firm tofu. **You Might Lower Your Risk of Heart Disease** Another perk of eating traditional soy foods every day is the possibility of reducing your risk of heart disease. A recent study published in Circulation discovered that individuals who ate at least one serving of tofu every week had an 18% lower risk of heart disease than those who had less than one serving per month. In fact, soy is the only plant-based protein that the Food and Drug Administration authorizes to bear the health claim that a diet low in saturated fat that includes soy protein may reduce the risk of coronary heart disease. **You Might Reduce Your Cholesterol Levels** Eating soy foods may also reduce your LDL ("bad") cholesterol levels. A 2019 review published in The Journal of Nutrition found that consuming 25 grams of soy protein per day (slightly more than half a cup of raw firm tofu) for six weeks reduced LDL cholesterol by 3% to 4% compared to those who did not eat any. Still, the debate about consuming soy and its potential to lower cholesterol levels is ongoing. Some studies did not find that soy could significantly lower cholesterol. Nevertheless, you may still want to include these low-saturated-fat, soy-based foods in your diet. For instance, every cup of edamame contains only about 1 gram of saturated fat, and every 1/2 cup of firm tofu has 1.5 grams, making them perfect alternatives to animal-based proteins that are typically higher in saturated fat.
